Wanted: Storage Robbery Suspect
description.content: On November 18, officers responded to call of an assault with a deadly weapon. When they arrived, they found a 48-year-old man with a non-life threatening stab wound. He told officers he had been beat and robbed by a man with a revolver and a woman. 25-year-old Julie Fox of Sacramento was arrested a week later. 35-year-old James Peacock is still on the run. Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Alert at 443 HELP. addthis_pub = 'kfbk';

description.hltext_display: Россия: Импорт соевого шрота пошел вверх
description.content:
В ноябре ввоз соевого шрота в Россию увеличился по сравнению с октябрем почти в 2,5 раза, достигнув 58 тыс.т, что является самым высоким месячным показателем с декабря 2009 г.
Можно ожидать, что отмена импортной пошлины на соевый шрот приведет к дальнейшему росту его ввоза, что позволит смягчить проблемы в животноводстве, вызванные дефицитом кормов из-за засухи.
Данные по внешней торговле зерновыми, масличными и продуктами их переработки см. ближайший выпуск «Обзор российского рынка зерновых и масличных».

description.hltext_display: Boeing: Kündigen bald Wiederaufnahme der 787-Testflüge an
description.content:
Tokio (Reuters) - Boeing will in Kürze die Wiederaufnahme der Testflüge für seine 787 "Dreamliner"-Flugzeuge ankündigen.
Dies sagte der Präsident der japanischen Sparte des US-Konzerns, Mike Denton, am Mittwoch in Tokio. Zu dem Zeitplan für die Auslieferung machte er keine Angaben. Boeing hatte die Testflüge der 787 gestoppt, nachdem Anfang November eine der Maschinen notlanden musste. Das Flugzeug soll besonders wenig Treibstoff verbrauchen. Der Airbus-Konkurrent liegt mit der neuen 787 fast drei Jahre hinter dem Zeitplan zurück.

description.hltext_display: Hunde- und Katzenfutter in hervorragender Qualitt zu gnstigen Preisen
description.content: PresseMitteilung von FutterShuttle Eutingen-Weitingen: Der Unternehmen Futter-Shuttle bietet Tierbesitzern Premium Trocken- und Nassfutter für Hunde und Katzen (firmenpresse) - Ein hervorragender Service, exzellente Produkte und eine gesunde Tiernahrung, das ist die Philosophie des Unternehmens Futter-Shuttle. Der Tierfutter Hersteller beliefert seine Kunden direkt, sodass keine Kosten für den Groß- und Einzelhandel gezahlt werden müssen. Diese Ersparnisse werden an die Kunden weitergegeben. Premiumkunden erhalten 50 Prozent Rabatt auf alle Preise. Für nur 9,95 Euro im halben Jahr können Kunden den Premiumstatus erhalten, Abnahmeverpflichtungen und langfristige Bindungen bestehen nicht. Das Trockenfutter und Nassfutter für Katzen (http://www.futter-shuttle.de) und Hunde wird aus 100 Prozent frischem Fleisch hergestellt. Chemische Geschmacksverstärker, Zucker und Farbstoffe werden nicht verarbeitet. Das exzellente Futter steigert die Energie der Hunde und Katzen, sorgt für ein glänzendes Fell und für ein intaktes Immunsystem. Die Superpremium Tiernahrung wurde speziell für Welpen, kranke und ältere Hunde hergestellt. Außerdem führt die Firma Futter Shuttle ein getreidefreies Allergiker Trockenfutter für Hunde.Mindestbestellmengen werden von Futter-Shuttle nicht verlangt, die Produkte werden immer umgehend ausgeliefert. In dem attraktiv gestalteten Online-Shop können Katzenfutter (http://www.futter-shuttle.de) und Hundefutter, Nahrungsergänzungen und Zubehör in nur wenigen Minuten bestellt werden. Ein spezielles Programm für Züchter bietet viele interessante Vorteile. Besonders hervorzuheben ist der exzellente Service des Unternehmens. Kostenlose Futterproben und ausführliche Futterberatungen sind für das Unternehmen selbstverständlich. Eine erfahrene Ernährungsberaterin beantwortet alle Fragen rund um das Tierfutter. Die komplette Produktpalette, Preise, kostenloser Katalog, kostenlose Futterproben und Informationen über das Unternehmen finden Kunden auf der Webseite: www.futter-shuttle.de (http://www.futter-shuttle.de) Weitere Informationen: FutterShuttleInh. description.hltext_display: Для искоренения африканской чумы свиней потребуется 8-10 лет
description.content:
Для искоренения африканской чумы свиней (АЧС) в настоящее время необходимо провести целый комплекс мер, но даже в этом случае на избавление от болезни потребуется 8-10 лет, сообщил заместитель руководителя Россельхознадзора и главный ветеринарный врач РФ Николай Власов.
"Сейчас мы стараемся удержать АЧС в пределах Южного федерального округа и не пустить в центральные регионы России", - сказал Власов в ходе пресс-конференции, состоявшейся на площадке РИА Новости.
По его словам для того, чтобы искоренить АЧС, надо провести депопуляцию дикого кабана, закрыть Россию от ЮФО защитным поясом, установить полный контроль передвижения поднадзорных грузов, а так же сосредоточить в ЮФО основные силы федеральной ветеринарной службы, силы МВД.
Говоря про депопуляцию дикого кабана, Власов отметил, что "это первая мера, которую надо сделать, но которая не делается". Так, по словам Власова, весной средний приплод дикого кабана при низкой плотности популяции составляет 8 голов на свиноматку.
Он отметил, что если ситуация по АЧС не изменится, "то весной можно будет ловить африканскую чуму свиней в Центральном федеральном округе". По его словам, количество неблагополучных пунктов в стране перевалило за 70. Сейчас наблюдается небольшая стабилизация обстановки по АЧС, но она связана с сезонным фактором. Весной, когда начнется миграция кабанов, опять ожидается всплеск.
Защитный движущийся пояс, по словам Власова, должен расположиться от Саратовской и Волгоградской области и идти на юг России. В этом поясе необходимо чистить все емкости по хранению мяса по всей сети снабжения. "Государство должно регулировать все движение свинины", - подчеркнул Власов.
По словам замруководителя ведомства, столь же важной задачей для Россельхознадзора является создание системы утилизации биологических отходов. "В России должна работать система утилизации биологических отходов, особенно это важно в рамках существовании проблемы распространения африканская чума свиней", - сказал Власов. В частности, он сообщил, что система утилизации биоотходов была полностью разрушена после перестройки. "Система убита начисто", - подчеркнул Власов.
По словам главного ветврача РФ, из тех предприятий по утилизации биоотходов, что работали в ЮФО в советское время, функционирует лишь 2 завода, ранее же в каждом субъекте было по 3-4 предприятия. "Хаотическое выбрасывание трупов животных и других биологических отходов приводит к усиленному распространению заразных болезней, в том числе африканской чумы свиней", - отметил он. "Это очень серьезная проблема и никаких положительных изменений нет, а деградация продолжается", - сказал Власов.
Африканская чума свиней (болезнь Монтгомери) впервые была зафиксирована в 1903 году в Южной Африке. В естественных условиях к заболеванию восприимчивы домашние и дикие свиньи. Заражение происходит при контакте здоровых животных с больными. Для человека вирус опасности не представляет, однако наносит колоссальный экономический ущерб.

description.hltext_display: Sidak&Teece decken Netzneutralitätsregulierungen auf
description.content:
292243 PresseMitteilungen online
Über firmenpresse| Mobile | Google News | Twitter | Presseportal | Werbung / Mediadaten | Statistiken | Kontakt | Sitemap | Impressum
PresseMitteilungen/ Medien und Unterhaltung vorherige PM| nächste PM
PresseMitteilung von Criterion Economics, L.L.C.
(ots) - Die
Wirtschaftsargumentation der Netzneutralitätsregulierung, die
voraussichtlich diese Woche bei der Federal Communications Commission
eingehen wird, ist im Wesentlichen fehlerhaft, so die Professoren J.
Gregory Sidak und David J. Teece. In einem Artikel aus dem Journal of
Competition Law & Economics, herausgeben von der Oxford University
Press, erklären Sidak und Teece, dass die geplanten Regulierungen der
FCC eine Verbannung oder Beschränkung bewirken würden der
freiwilligen Business-to-Business Geschäftsvorgänge zwischen
Breitband-Internetanbieter (Internet-Service-Provider, ISPs) und
Inhatanbietern, die für verbessertes Liefern der Pakete übers
Internet da sind. Die geplante "Gleichbehandlungs-" Regel würde
ironischerweise aktiv gegen alle Arten von Inhalt oder Anwendung
diskiminieren, die sich im Gewissheitsbedürfnis für bessere
Übertragungsqualität übers Internet (auch bekannt als Quality of
Service oder QoS) von dem was undifferenzierte, beste
Lieferanstrengungen bieten könnten, unterscheiden. Dieser Resultat
würde nicht nur die stationäre Effizienz reduzieren durch die
Unterstützung der hohen Verbraucherpreise, sondern würde auch
dynamische Effizienz reduzieren durch ein Zurückhalten der
Innovation.
Den vollen Text finden Sie auf der folgenden Seite:
http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=1593761.
J. Gregory Sidak ist der Vorsitzender von Criterion Economics,
L.L.C. (http://www.criterioneconomics.com) in Washington, D.C. und
der Ronald-Coase-Rechts- und Wissenschaftsprofessor an der Tilburg
University (TILEC) in den Niederlanden.
David J. Teece ist der Vorsitzender und Principal Executive
Officer der Berkeley Research Group LLC (http://www.brg-expert.com)
und der Thomas-W.-Tusher-Professor in Global Business an der Haas
School of Business an der University of California, Berkeley.
Beide sind international anerkannte Experten in Sachen
Kartellrecht, geistiges Eigentum, Regulierungen der
Netzwerkindustrien und komplexe Wirtschaftsprozesse.
Pressekontakt:
CONTACT: Allison Crowley, +1-202-518-5120,
acrowley(at)criterioneconomics.com

description.hltext_display: Community Wants To End Gang Violence
description.content: Sacramento Mayor Kevin Johsnon joined other local leaders, residents and the NAACP today in announcing an effort aimed at curbing gang violence. Among the victims of last week's shooting at Fly Cuts and Styles on Stockton Blvd. was thirty year old Monqiue Nelson who was shielding her baby son. Sacramento County Sheriff Scott Jones was also in attendance, pledging all he could to the cause but noting that crime prevention hinges on community involvement and that the investigation has been hampered by uncooperative and fearful witnesses. There has been one arrest in the crime. addthis_pub = 'kfbk';

Anna palautetta
Anna toimitukselle palautetta tästä.
Anna uutisvinkki
Voit antaa uutisvinkin tällä lomakkeella Vuonna 2009 viidennes väestöstä tupakoi päivittäin.
Suomalaisista aikuisista miehistä 22 prosenttia ja naisista 16 prosenttia tupakoi päivittäin. Noin 6 prosenttia aikuisista tupakoi satunnaisesti. Päivittäin 15-24-vuotiaista miehistä poltti 14 prosenttia, satunnaisesti 10 prosenttia ja samanikäisistä naisista vastaavat osuudet olivat 14 ja 9 prosenttia.
Vuonna 2009 suomalaisista 15-64-vuotiaista miehistä 70 prosenttia oli tupakoimattomia ja naisista vastaavasti 79 prosenttia. Miesten tupakointi on vähentynyt pitkällä aikavälillä. Naisten tupakointi taas pysyi samalla tasolla 1980-luvun puolivälistä lähtien, mutta on viime vuosina kääntynyt laskuun.
Nuuskaa käytti vuonna 2009 päivittäin 1,7 prosenttia 15-64-vuotiaista miehistä. Nuuskaaminen oli yleisintä 25-34-vuotiailla miehillä, joista 5,2 prosenttia ilmoitti nuuskaavansa päivittäin. Satunnaisesti eniten nuuskasivat 15-24-vuotiaat miehet, joista 9,3 prosenttia ilmoitti nuuskaavansa satunnaisesti. Prosentti 15-24-vuotiaista naisista nuuskasi satunnaisesti.
Miehistä 83 prosenttia ja naisista 97 prosenttia ei ole koskaan nuuskannut. Tiedot ilmenevät Tupakkatilastosta, joka perustuu pääosin Terveyden ja hyvinvoinnin laitoksen ja Tullihallituksen tutkimuksiin ja tilastoihin.

description.hltext_display: US poised to approve nuclear arms pact with Russia
Cru Digital gives staff ‘Google time’ – 10 hours to do whatever
description.author: David Olsen
description.content:
Brisbane based small business and digital agency Cru Digital is giving staff 10 hours a week ‘creative time’ to encourage creativity in the workplace.
The concept is based around Google’s ‘20 percent time’, which allows employees to spend a fifth of their working week on projects of their own choosing.
“Cru has a reputation for innovation and creativity and we never stop pushing the boundaries,” Cru’s general manager Rob Ryan said.
“To help manage that creative culture, staff get 10 hours a week to carry out research, develop ideas, finish off things that they think they need to get up to standard and support each other.
“We ask our designers to get out to galleries, shows and exhibitions and to talk between themselves about what they see.”
Employees at Cru, recognised as one of the top 10 digital agencies in the world, visit galleries such as the Queensland Gallery of Modern Art (GOMA), participate in Australian Interactive Media Industry Association events and research websites awarded for their cutting edge creativity.
Mr Ryan said the concept gave designers and developers the time to study new trends like HTML5 – a new version of HTML and XHTML, which is being used to build sites for clients unwilling to use Flash.
He said creative time had also led to the development of Snapp CMS – Cru’s own partner-centric, hosted content management platform which will be launched as a service in February.
“Two of our team have just returned from the US where they have been discussing the creative process with other international leaders in this space,” Mr Ryan said. “The initiative will hopefully deliver other ideas to help us nurture and grow the creative culture.”
Based in Newstead, Cru has accumulated 27 international awards this year including recent accolades for its work with Lorna Jane and Dreamworld. Other clients include the Queensland Department of Justice, Suzuki Queensland, Fortitude Valley mega venue Cloudland and Parmalat brand Breaka.

event_or_fact.property: creative time had also led to the development of Snapp CMS ? Cru?s own partner-centric, hosted content management platform which will be launched as a service in February
the concept gave designers and developers the time to study newtrends like HTML5 ? a new version of HTML and XHTML, which is being used to build sites for clients unwilling to use Flash

description.hltext_display: Mergers and Acquisitions Expected to Rise in 2011
description.content:
SUSIE GHARIB: It's beginning to look a lot like two years ago. Stocks are now trading at their highest level since September 2008. Let's run down the numbers for you. The Dow tacked on 56 points today to close at 11,534. The NASDAQ added 18 closing at a three-year high and the S&P gained 7 1/2. Financials were a big part of today's move, as TD Bank announced that it's buying Chrysler Financial for $6.3 billion. As the year draws to a close, mergers and acquisitions are picking up again. Erika Miller takes a look at whether the deal making will continue in 2011.
ERIKA MILLER, NIGHTLY BUSINESS REPORT CORRESPONDENT: If you listen closely, you might start hearing wedding bells on Wall Street. More companies are expected to tie the knot in the coming months. While 2010 was a recovery year for mergers and acquisitions, activity is expected to pick up a bit in 2011. M&A expert Rich Peterson says it depends on the health of the economy.
RICHARD PETERSON, ANALYST, STANDARD & POOR'S: There's a correlation between the rate of GDP growth and M&A activity. And we're in a period of positive growth in terms of the economy, but it's tepid. It's modest.
MILLER: Peterson is betting that next year U.S. M&A activity could reach $900 billion. That would be a sizeable increase from this year's $800 billion level, but a far cry from the heady days before the financial crisis. So what's likely to fuel the urge to merge? For some companies, it may be their desire to go global with their business, as well as all the money they've squirreled away.
PETERSON: If you look at corporate cash levels, according to numbers we see here at Standard & Poor's, non-financial companies in the S&P 500 have approximately $1 trillion cash on hand. So, there's the currency to do the deal activity.
MILLER: Experts predict many deals will happen in the cash-rich technology arena. Also look for mergers in the basic materials and energy sectors. For individual investors, it's difficult to guess which companies will get hitched. But market strategist Phil Dow says M&A activity is good for the stock market overall.
PHIL DOW, DIR., EQUITY STRATEGY, RBC WEALTH MANAGEMENT: Deal activity up is kind of like the market heading up -- it draws people in. My guess is this is a sustainable economic recovery. If you note corporate earnings have been strong for two years, beating analysts' expectations for two years now, my guess is that continues next year.
MILLER: It's not just American companies that are looking for mates. Analysts expect more cross-border marriages, as long the global economy continues to improve. Erika Miller, NIGHTLY BUSINESS REPORT, New York.

event_or_fact.property: M&A activity is good for the stock market overall

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank legt US-Steuerstreit mit 550 Mio Dollar bei
description.content:
Frankfurt/New York (Reuters) - Die Deutsche Bank zieht mit einer Strafzahlung von einer halben Milliarde Dollar einen Schlussstrich unter jahrelange US-Steuerermittlungen.
Mit dem US-Justizministerium sei eine Nichtverfolgungsvereinbarung (Non-Prosecution Agreement) getroffen worden, teilte der deutsche Branchenprimus am Dienstagabend mit. Die Deutsche Bank zahle 553,6 Millionen Dollar. Dafür würden alle Ermittlungen eingestellt, die es im Zusammenhang mit steuerbezogenen Geschäften für Kunden aus den Jahren 1996 bis 2002 gegeben habe.
Auswirkungen auf das laufende Ergebnis nach Steuern wird die Strafe nach Angaben der Bank nicht haben, schließlich sei die gesamte Summe durch Rückstellungen abgedeckt. Die US-Staatsanwaltschaft in Manhattan erklärte, die Höhe der Strafe entspreche in etwa dem, was die Bank mit ihren Steuerhinterziehungsmodellen verdient habe. Die Deutsche Bank habe zudem einer Zivilstrafe von 149 Millionen Dollar zugestimmt. Daneben werde künftig ein unabhängiger Beobachter kontrollieren, ob der Konzern seine inzwischen verschärften Compliance-Richtlinien auch einhalte.
Die US-Behörden gehen davon aus, dass ihnen durch die Steuerhinterziehung der Deutsche-Bank-Kunden in den Jahren 1996 bis 2002 Einnahmen in Milliardenhöhe entgangen sind. Einen ähnlichen Streit hatte es mit der UBS gegeben. Dieser wurde ebenfalls gegen eine Strafzahlung beigelegt - die Schweizer Bank zahlte mit 780 Millionen Dollar aber noch etwas mehr, um das Kapitel zu schließen.

description.hltext_display: Movie review: Coen brothers' "True Grit" hews close to great novel
description.author: Lisa Kennedy
description.content:
Charles Portis' 1968 novel "True Grit" is a quick and vigorous read, with a heroine of surprisingly unyielding opinions.
Her name is Mattie Ross. And when the near-mythic tale begins on the page and on-screen in Joel and Ethan Coen's beautifully wrought version Mattie is no longer the 14-year-old girl she was when she solicited the help of a rough, one-eyed U.S. marshal to avenge her father's murder.
"True Grit" opens with the voice of Mattie, 25 years after the events, setting the scene as flakes of snow drift down upon a body in a street. It is the saddest of snow globes. On a business trip, her father was shot by his hired hand Tom Chaney (Josh Brolin), a man of ill temper.
Last year, as the Coens' "A Serious Man" headed into art houses, the brothers were hopeful that their next film would be the Western "True Grit," with Jeff Bridges in the role of the marshal, Reuben J. "Rooster" Cogburn.
"Charles Portis' novel is a really great one," they told The Denver Post at the time. But their film was not, they emphasized, going to be a redux of the 1969 movie, which famously starred John Wayne as Cogburn, singer Glen Campbell as a Texas Ranger, and a tomboyish and impossibly aggravating Kim Darby as Mattie. The Duke won his first and only Oscar for the film.
This version gets many of its loamy pleasures from Bridges' performance. What a croak he gives Cogburn's whiskey- and smoke-scuffed voice. Mattie gets an earful because Rooster is a chatterbox.
Still, it is not far-fetched to think of this adaptation as "A Serious Girl."
With the aid of the Coen brothers' spare aesthetic and righteous script, newcomer Hailee Steinfeld brings a headstrong certainty to Mattie that echoes the author's portrayal of the Arkansas girl who arrives in Fort Smith to pick up her father's body.
She is a Bible-knowing Methodist. The movie's opening quote, "the wicked flee when none pursueth," is from Mattie, by way of Proverbs.
If 1969's Mattie was softened and secularized, this one is sustained by the Good Book as well as buoyed by her class entitlement.
She may be easy to say "No" to at first. Rooster does. And the Texas Ranger named LaBoeuf even threatens and makes good on a spanking. Matt Damon plays the prideful ranger who grudgingly joins Cogburn and Mattie in hunting Chaney.
But it is Mattie's faith in a man of "true grit" that proves her own mettle.
When Mattie asks the Fort Smith sheriff which U.S. marshal she should approach to track Chaney, he runs through her options. There's the gifted tracker. There's the pitiless man. There's the marshal who gets his quarry in the most law-abiding fashion.
The Coens let the timing of Mattie's choice hint at her own capacity for payback.
This "True Grit" makes the original almost unwatchable except as a curio, although Coloradans may recognize the "Indian territory" Mattie traverses as our own Rocky Mountain West. Wayne's film was shot in Colorado.
In the new version, Portis' novel is returned to its proper locale: the post-Civil War frontier where the James brothers raised such a nasty ruckus. (Jesse's brother Frank makes an amusing appearance.) It's the west of the Missouri and Arkansas hollows, hills and woodlands.
Strikingly shot by the brothers' go-to cinematographer Roger Deakins, there is soft winter light and the amber hues of fires and lanterns.
Most of Carter Burwell's austere score is created out of the quiet strains of the church-pew beauty, "Leaning on the Everlasting Arms." During the final credits, the hymn gets its twang and warble from singer-songwriter Iris DeMent. In a season of gifts, her version is a sweet one.
Film critic Lisa Kennedy: 303-954-1567 or lkennedy@denverpost.com. Also on blogs.denverpostcom/ madmoviegoer
"True Grit"
PG-13 for some intense sequences of Western violence, including disturbing images. 1 hour, 50 minutes. Written and directed by Joel and Ethan Coen; from the book by Charles Portis; photography by Roger Deakins; starring Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Hailee Steinfeld, Barry Pepper. Opens today at area theaters.

桃園再爆霸凌 高一女生被打到住院
description.content:
【聯合晚報╱記者吳佩玲╱桃園報導】
桃園縣霸凌案件如雪球般滾動，議員詹江村今天再爆校園霸凌，施虐者是一名縣立高中女學生，她揪集國中男女同學10多人，將一名同校高一女生押走拳打腳踼，造成女生受傷住院一星期，昨天雙方13萬元和解。
詹江村說，校園霸凌案一件件，教育處似乎都不知情，民代詢問，還在敷衍了事。教育處長吳林輝表示，這起案件發生在校外，學校在女生受傷後才知情，已通報，並非不聞不問，而且學校也有介入輔導，並請警方介入處理，上星期已把涉案與施暴的男女學生共5人依妨礙自由、傷害罪嫌移送偵辦。
縣長吳志揚表示，學生血氣方剛，校園霸凌事件有單純、複雜。有些狀況，只要導師適時排解與糾正，就可化解；但也有的超過老師的負荷，必須由學務處或是校外會、警方介入，他不贊同學校用隱匿方式來處理霸凌，因為如此只會讓問題更嚴重，面對問題提出解決對策，才符合教育的本質。
吳志揚表示，桃園縣將定出明確的霸凌處理流程，從霸凌定義，什麼情況下宜交由校方、警方來處理等方向，召開研習會向教師、行政人員宣導。
詹江村爆料的霸凌案發生在本月9日 ，一所縣立高中高二女生不滿同校一名高一女生和她日漸疏遠，當天下午5時下課後，邀被害女生在桃園市藝文園區談判，但是女生到達時才發現，對方人手眾多，她想逃跑，卻被10多名男女生包圍，先披打一記耳光，隨即被押走。

description.hltext_display: New Zealander wins payout over 'lost' elephant
description.content:
WELLINGTON, (AFP) – A New Zealand elephant handler won a wrongful dismissal claim Wednesday against a circus that falsely told him it had lost his beloved animal and his services were no longer required.
The Employment Relations Authority (ERA) found that Tony Ratcliffe, who had looked after Jumbo the elephant for 30 years, agreed to sell the animal to the Australian-based Loritz Bros. Circus in 2008 and act as its carer.
It said Ratcliffe, who once ran his own circus, disagreed with Loritz Bros. about the way the female elephant was being displayed to be fed by members of the public.
After the dispute, he went to the circus's scheduled camp at Tauranga, on the North Island, only to be told by a staff member that Jumbo was lost and circus workers were looking for her.
He later read in a newspaper that that 35-year-old elephant had been donated to the RSPCA.
The ERA found the circus deliberately plotted to mislead Ratcliffe about the elephant's fate, causing him considerable distress about an animal he had formed a close relationship with over three decades.
It ruled Wednesday he had been unfairly dismissed and ordered the circus to pay 26,000 dollars (19,300 US) compensation for lost wages, humiliation and distress at not being able to say goodbye to his long-term charge.
Jumbo now lives at the Franklin Zoo, south of Auckland, where she has been named Mila and is undergoing rehabilitation with the aim of allowing her to socialise with other elephants, national news agency NZPA reported.

description.hltext_display: Partnership between New Milford Hospital and public library give residents new health tool
description.content:
NEW MILFORD -- With a home computer and a library card, local residents can now access a one-stop health-care website that can give them the latest information on how to prevent, treat or manage any imaginable disease.
They can even see video clips on surgical techniques, or listen to live debates on alternative medicine.
New Milford Hospital and the New Milford Public Library are collaborating on a new venture aimed at empowering people to improve their own health care by offering them on-site and online resources that include mainstream medical practices as well as integrative, alternative practices and natural health remedies.
To that end, the two groups have created the Community Health Information Center that has not only a physical headquarters in a corner of the library's lower-level research center designated with a specially designed logo, but an online component exclusively linked to the library's website: Ebsco Consumer Health Complete.
At the library, people can pick up a variety of medical literature, including New Milford Hospital-specific programs and services, and peruse the latest health books as well as do research in the nearby medical stacks. They can log into the library computers and access the new health website.
Yet they can also -- with their library card -- access the website in the privacy of their own home, through their doctor's office, or even from their hospital bed.
"We like having people come to the library, but that can sometimes be difficult, especially for a hospital patient. So having this available remotely is key,'' said library director Carl DeMilia.
Hospital executive Marydale DeBor said the partnership is rooted in the hospital's Planetree initiative meant to promote collaborative, community health care and patient-centered care.
Back in February, DeMilia said hospital leaders approached him about partnering to create a health resource venue. He was eager to help, since the library's mission is to be an information resource. With some research, he was able to find that a company the library now uses for other web research materials had a comprehensive, easily navigable health-related database.
DeBor said the hospital was able to contribute $4,000 toward the project.
With such an online resource, DeMilia said, there was no need to devote lots of money or space to the purchase and location of medical periodicals. Instead, people can spend as much time as they wish searching for materials that can range from physician-oriented periodicals to more simple, consumer-friendly fact sheets.
"I'm excited. I think this is great for the community,'' DeMilia said.
DeBor concurs. "We see this as a powerful tool.''
Contact Nanci G. Hutson at nhutson@newstimes.com or at 860-354-2274.

description.hltext_display: Tieliikenteessä kuoli 19 ihmistä marraskuussa
description.content:
Tieliikenteessä sattui marraskuussa Tilastokeskuksen ennakkotietojen mukaan 474 henkilövahinkoon johtanutta onnettomuutta.
Onnettomuuksissa kuoli 19 ja loukkaantui 616 ihmistä. Kuolleita oli 9 enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin vuoden 2009 marraskuussa.

description.hltext_display: Martinez talks games, not rumours
description.content:
Roberto Martinez insists Wigan's players will not be distracted by media speculation in the run-up to the re-opening of the transfer window.
Latics are currently languishing in the Premier League relegation zone and are believed to be fighting to retain the services of star duo Charles N'Zogbia and Hugo Rodallega, both of whom have been linked with moves away from the DW Stadium next month.
The loss of either would be a blow to the club's hopes of retaining their Premier League status for another season, but with key games against Wolves, Arsenal and Newcastle to come over the festive period, Martinez is focused only on getting points on the board.
Responding to the speculation, the Spaniard told Sky Sports News: "At the moment there is no real truth in it, the window hasn't opened yet.
"We are not going to stop any rumours or any media speculation. If there is anything else the fans will be the first ones to know.
"The players are very aware that the games that we have got in this period are vital for our season and that is where the focus and concentration goes.
"The focus goes to the games that we have got ahead of us. Sunday [against Wolves] is a massive, massive game, and it would be a big mistake for us to look ahead and think about players who could come in or who could leave.
"Every point in the Premier League is so important and our focus goes to Sunday, nothing else."

description.hltext_display: El Salvador: 50 Migranten im Mexiko entführt
description.content:
Oaxaca/San Salvador (Reuters) - Im Süden Mexikos sind nach Angaben El Salvadors 50 Migranten aus Zentralamerika entführt worden.
Bewaffnete hätten einem Güterzug angehalten, mit dem die Menschen unterwegs waren, und die Migranten in ihre Gewalt gebracht, teilte das Außenministerium des Landes am Dienstag mit. Zeugen zufolge seien die Menschen von den Angreifern mit Macheten geschlagen und bestohlen worden. Dann seien alle Frauen verschleppt worden. Der Priester Alejandro Solalinde erklärte, Augenzeugen hätten erklärt, unter den 50 Entführten seien auch Kinder gewesen. Die Tat habe sich bereits am 16. Dezember ereignet. Von den Verschleppten fehle bislang jede Spur. Er vermute, dass Mitglieder der Drogenbande Zetas hinter der Entführung steckten.
El Salvador forderte Mexiko auf, den Vorfall zu untersuchen. Es sei nicht hinnehmbar, dass es solche gewaltsame Zwischenfälle gegen Migranten gebe, die auf dem Weg in die USA durch Mexiko reisten. Die Nationalität der Entführten war zunächst unklar. Es sollen jedoch Frauen aus Honduras und Nicaragua darunter gewesen sein. Auch Honduras fragte bei Mexiko um Informationen nach. Das mexikanische Innenministerium erklärte, es gebe keinerlei Hinweise auf ein solches Verschwinden.
Manche Migranten zahlen bis zu 10.000 Dollar an Schmuggler, die ihnen versprechen, sie in die USA zu bringen. Viele werden auf dem Weg dorthin ausgeraubt, angegriffen oder inhaftiert. Frauen berichten häufig von Vergewaltigungen während der Reise und einige werden zur Prostitution gezwungen. Zudem gibt es den Vorwurf, korrupte mexikanische Polizeibeamte würden illegale Einwanderer an Drogenbanden verkaufen. Zahllose Menschen aus Lateinamerika nehmen die 3000 Kilometer lange Reise aus ihren Heimatländern in der Hoffnung auf ein besseres Leben in den USA in Kauf.

description.hltext_display: Assor tar medaljer i massor
description.content:
Alexander Assor är en stor simmartalang som samlat på sig massor av medaljer under två års tävlande – närmare bestämt 61 stycken.
– Han har en naturlig fallenhet för simning, bra teknik och han har potential. Han är också envis och träningsvillig, säger tränaren Tobias Larsson. Larsson berättar att Assor under hösten har varit sjuk i perioder, ändå har det gått bra i de tävlingar han ställt upp i.
I nuläget är Assor rankad åtta i Sverige, av totalt 274 simmare.
I samma träningsgrupp ingår också Tilda Larsson som även hon visat stora framsteg enligt tränare Larsson.
Simklubben Vänersborg hade i november fyra simmare med i sum-sim region, ett bra bevis på klubbens framfart då man året före inte hade någon deltagare med. Dock gick ingen av dem vidare till den nationella finalen.
Nära för Lexxus
– Men en av våra killar, Lexxus Sparks, var inte långt ifrån. Han hamnade just utanför de som kvalade in till finalen, säger Tobias Larsson.
Däremot nådde samtliga fem simmare de kvaltider som gäller för DM i Skövde i mitten av januari.
Klubben har också varit i Danmark och tredagars-tävlingen i Köge.
Där blev Lisa Persson (född -92) bästa simmare i klubben då hon nådde en finalplats i 50 meter bröst. Även i övrigt blev det en lyckad tävling för SKV-simmarna som återvände hem med flertal personliga rekord.
– Nu väntar en tuff träningsperiod inför DM, vi har också Åmålsdoppet att sikta på för våra simmare. I slutet av januari och början av februari är det också tävlingar.

description.hltext_display: Pennant keen on Stoke stay
description.content:
Stoke's on-loan winger Jermaine Pennant has confirmed he would like to make his move to the Britannia Stadium a permanent arrangement.
The former Arsenal, Birmingham and Liverpool wideman is currently on loan with the Premier League outfit from Spanish side Real Zaragoza.
The 27-year-old is settled and is enjoying his football for Tony Pulis' side and is keen to join permanently if terms can be agreed between clubs.
Pennant has been moved by the reception he has received from Stoke's fans, stating their warm welcome has made him feel right at home.
"The lads are a great set of lads. The manager has given me a platform, he's been great with me. The fans have been fantastic," he told Sky Sports News.
"I don't think I could have asked for a better reception. They treat me like I've already signed and I've been a player here for two years.
"The club in general is a fantastic place to be. I'm enjoying it here. I'm enjoying my football. Putting pen-to-paper would be ideal for me."

event_or_fact.property: The lads are a great set of lads. The manager has given me a platform, he's been great with me. The fans have been fantastic

description.hltext_display: Kim Roger till Skoftebyn
description.content:
Det blev ingen fortsättning med FC Trollhättan.
Spel i Trollhättan blir det ändå – med Skoftebyn.
– Det känns spännande, säger Kim Roger Strand.
Den 27-årige norrmannen fortsätter alltså med fotboll i Trollhättan. Han kom till FC Trollhättan säsongen 2008 i division 1 södra och bidrog starkt till att klubben avancerade till superettan det året.
Väl där skadade han hälsenan före premiären och större delen av säsongen förstördes. Under FCT:s andra år i näst högsta serien fick han begränsat med speltid. Men av den varan blir det förmodligen mer av framöver.
Kim Roger och Skoftebyn är nämligen överens om att han är deras spelare kommande säsong. Division 2-nykomlingen anmälde tidigt sitt intresse, men norrmannen behövde tid att fundera på sin situation. Fler klubbar hade också gjort en framstöt, men valet föll till slut på Skoftebyn.
– Jag vill helst bo kvar i Trollhättan, säger Kim Roger som till sommaren är färdigutbildad maskiningenjör.
Redo att ta ansvar
Har man färska meriter från superettan och division 1 får han räkna med högt ställda förväntningar, men press är fel ord enligt Kim Roger.
– Jag har inte tänkt så mycket på det. Jag hoppas att jag kan bidra på ett positivt sätt, men det är ingen garanti att det ska gå bra bara för att du har spelat i superettan. Fast det är klart, lite ansvar får man ju ta.
Skoftebyntränaren Johan Brinck gläds över nyförvärvet.
– Ett jättefint tillskott, säger Brinck vars intresse för Strand ökade efter samtal med L-O Mattsson (FCT:s förre tränare).
Med Kim Roger i laget blir man än mer slagkraftigt.
– Vi skapar flera alternativ, men vi har det ändå rätt bra beställt på forwardssidan. Truppen vill ha bra konkurrens, och då får vi tro på det här, säger Brinck.
Skoftebyn körde årets sista träningspass på måndagskvällen och tar nu julledigt fram till den 6 januari.

description.hltext_display: Südkorea kündigt große Militärübung an der Grenze zum Norden an
description.content:
Seoul (Reuters) - Inmitten der sich abzeichnenden leichten Entspannung im Korea-Konflikt hat der Süden sein bislang größtes Militärmanöver nahe der Grenze zum Norden angekündigt.
Beobachter erwarten, dass Nordkorea wütend reagieren wird.
Die Anzahl der Soldaten bei dem für Donnerstag geplanten Manöver werde die höchste sein, die es je bei einer Übung in Friedenszeiten gegeben habe, teilte Südkoreas Armee am Mittwoch mit, ohne genaue Zahlen zu nennen. Bei dem Manöver mit scharfer Munition würden Einheiten der Artillerie und auch Kampfflugzeuge eingesetzt. Es handele sich um eine Übung an Land in der Region Pocheon, etwa 50 Kilometer nördlich von Seoul.
Südkorea hatte erst am Montag eine äußerst umstrittene Übung mit scharfer Munition in einem zwischen Nord- und Südkorea strittigen Seegebiet durchgeführt. Nordkorea hatte für den Fall dieser Übung mit Krieg gedroht, sich nach dem Manöver aber ungewöhnlich zurückhaltend gezeigt. Der Norden hatte in dem umstrittenen Seegebiet am 23. November nach einem Manöver des Südens die südkoreanische Insel Yeonpyeong beschossen und vier Menschen getötet. Es war der schwerwiegendste Angriff seit dem Ende des Korea-Kriegs 1953.
Nordkorea hatte sich nach Aussage von US-Gouverneur Bill Richardson am Dienstag bereiterklärt, wieder Inspektoren der Internationalen Atomenergie-Behörde (IAEA) ins Land zu lassen. Der inoffizielle US-Gesandte erklärte, Nordkorea habe bei seinen Gesprächen eine pragmatische Einstellung an den Tag gelegt. Er äußerte zudem die Ansicht, das nordkoreanische Angebot könne zu einer Wiederaufnahme der Sechs-Parteien-Gespräche zum Atomprogramm Nordkoreas führen. An den Gesprächen sind neben den beiden koreanischen Staaten die USA, Russland, Japan und China beteiligt.

description.hltext_display: Leismaniasis parasite can be transmitted by more types of insect: Australian researchers
description.author: more than one spices of insect
description.content:
CANBERRA, Dec. 22 (Xinhua) -- Australian researchers said Wednesday they have found a deadly parasite can be transmitted by more than one spices of insect, raising hopes the discovery could save lives.
The leismaniasis parasite causes a disease that leads to large ulcers forming on the skin.
According to Menzies School of Health researcher Deborah Holt, no human cases have been recorded in Australia since the leismaniasis parasite was discovered in Australia seven years ago. The strand of parasite in Australia has only infected kangaroos and wallabies.
Scientists believed the disease could only be transmitted by sandflies, but Dr Holt said research shows biting midges can also act as a vector.
Tens of thousands of people around the world are infected by leismaniasis every year and thousands die.
"That's the first evidence anywhere in the world that an insect other than a sandfly is capable of transmitting the parasite," she told ABC News on Wednesday.
"This raises real possibilities that there are other insects involved and that may be a reason why some of the control programs don't work as well as what they would be expected to.
"And in addition there are some places in the world where the vector is unknown and they cannot find evidence that they are being transmitted by sandflies.
"And now we believe that this may be because they are being transmitted by another insect."
Holt said if a deadlier strain was to enter the country from overseas, it could pose a significant risk to people.

event_or_fact.property: That's the first evidence anywhere in the world that an insect other than a sandfly is capable of transmitting the parasite
research shows biting midges can also act as a vector
if a deadlier strain was to enter the country from overseas, it could pose a significant risk to people

description.hltext_display: 印刷烏龍！ 農民曆印「中國民國」100年 (TVBS)
description.content:
台中縣豐原市公所，最近印製大約5萬份的農民曆分送民眾，原本是一樁美意，卻有眼尖民眾發現，「中華民國」100年，變成「中國民國」100年，引發政治聯想，豐原市公所解釋，是前陣子忙五都選舉，校對有疏失，已經請印刷廠加印「華」字貼紙，希望更正。
大紅色底圖，還印著一隻小白兔，這是豐原市公所發送給里民，民國100年的農年曆，但民眾拿到手，不禁笑出聲。民眾：「中國民國，哈哈哈，中國民國啊！」民眾：「這是什麼情形，這是誰印的？」
問題就出在封面，中華民國100年，印成了中「國」民國100年，差一個字差很多，要不是市民眼尖發現，打電話反映，市公所人員可能還不知道，農年曆印刷錯誤。豐原市公所人員：「應該是去抓錯字，他(印刷廠)定稿之後給我們，我們沒有看到，這是我們的疏忽。」
除了封面，內容都沒問題，市公所解釋，因為前陣子都在忙選舉，承辦人員校稿時沒注意，就向印刷廠印了5萬本，事後承辦人員自覺有疏失，自請處份，另外市公所也緊急請印刷廠，加印一張小貼紙中華的「華」，分送給市民自己貼上去補救，避免有過多的政治聯想。

description.hltext_display: Will things improve with new Iraqi government? (2)
description.content:
BIG CHALLENGES AHEAD
The new government, which includes elements of Sunni, Shiite and the Kurds, faces the task of achieving internal conformity and bringing about political stability. But can there be real solidarity?
Some analysts said the government could fail in that task because of infighting among the political factions. "One of the most prominent challenges for the new government would be how to keep a level of consensus among its components. Particularly, it will face several insurmountable problems like reforming the constitution, the Kirkuk issue, and some other problems that the factions are in deep division about," Sabah al-Shiekh, a professor at Baghdad University, told Xinhua. "Moreover, Maliki's government is flabby because it has many useless ministries like state ministries without portfolios which were created only to lure some political parties to participate in the political process," he said. "Such useless posts will affect the performance of the government. Particularly, the parliament seems to be so active to monitor the government," he said. "Maliki himself expressed his discontent about his cabinet formation, saying it is not like what he wished it to be. But later he said that nevertheless, he expected his new cabinet to perform better than the previous one, because there is more of an atmosphere of trust between the political blocs than the previous stage," Shiekh said. Former Prime Minister Ayad Allawi, strongly backed by the Sunnis, on Tuesday said his Iraqiya bloc would support the government and play a constructive role in it.
But Allawi is still waiting for the post of head of the National Council of Strategic Policies, which is supposed to play a major role in national security issues according to the power-sharing deals. How much power Maliki will really give the new body is still uncertain. "The Sunni-backed Iraqiya bloc gained several powerful positions in Maliki's cabinet, including speaker and finance minister and other portfolios; the question here is would that satisfy the Sunnis?" Ameri said. Maliki's new government will also have to face the dual challenge of a deteriorated security condition and building professional security forces, especially since the United States will completely pull out its remaining troops from the country by the end of 2011. "Therefore, Maliki kept the three sensitive security ministries (defense, interior and national security) for himself temporarily until he can carefully select the qualified persons for these crucial ministries," Shiekh said.

event_or_fact.property: his Iraqiya bloc would support the government and play a constructive role in it

description.hltext_display: Explosão em obra da transposição deixa 3 mortos
description.content:
Recife - Uma explosão no início da noite de ontem no lote 12 do canteiro de obras da transposição do Rio São Francisco, no município de Sertânia, a 316 quilômetros do Recife, provocou a morte de três trabalhadores. Outros 10 ficaram feridos, três deles em estado grave. De acordo com o delegado de plantão da área, Édson Augusto Lins de Andrade, até as 23 horas os corpos ainda não haviam sido removidos do local, aguardando a chegada de peritos do Instituto de Criminalística. "Somente depois da perícia, os corpos serão removidos para o Instituto de Medicina Legal (IML) de Caruaru", afirmou ele.
Inquérito policial será instaurado para investigar de que forma ocorreu a explosão, o tipo de explosivo usado e se houve algum tipo de negligência. Lins de Andrade preferiu não especular sobre o que teria motivado o acidente. Cauteloso, disse que qualquer informação seria "precipitada antes do laudo pericial".
A área foi isolada por bombeiros e policiais civis. Os feridos foram socorridos para o Hospital de Sertânia. Em estado grave, três deles foram removidos para o hospital de Arcoverde, na região. O canteiro de obras integra o Eixo leste da transposição, - uma das principais obras do governo federal - que terá 220 quilômetros de canais que irão captar água do rio em Itaparica (BA) para abastecer o agreste de Pernambuco e Paraíba. O Eixo Norte terá 400 quilômetros e vai captar água em Cabrobó (PE) para abastecer o sertão de Pernambuco, Paraíba, Ceará e Rio Grande do Norte. A previsão é de que na sua totalidade, quando concluída, a obra irá beneficiar 12 milhões de pessoas nos quatro Estados.

description.hltext_display: Population surge gives Texas 4 new US House seats
IPVA de 2011 já pode ser pago em São Paulo
description.content:
São Paulo - Os proprietários de veículos automotores registrados em São Paulo já podem efetuar o pagamento antecipado do Imposto sobre a Propriedade de Veículos Automotores (IPVA) do ano de 2011. A partir desta semana, todos os bancos credenciados estão habilitados a efetuar o recolhimento à vista, com desconto de 3%, ou receber a primeira das três parcelas do imposto. A Secretaria da Fazenda informa que começou a enviar os avisos de vencimento do imposto ontem e a postagem dos cerca de 14 milhões de informes será concluída até o final de dezembro.
O contribuinte tem o final de dezembro e o período até a data de vencimento da placa do veículo, em janeiro, para pagar o IPVA 2011 em cota única, com desconto de 3%, ou parcelar o tributo em três parcelas, nos meses de janeiro, fevereiro e março. Os proprietários têm também a opção de quitar o imposto em fevereiro, sem desconto. Em todos os casos, os proprietários devem respeitar o calendário de vencimento por final de placa. A Secretaria lembra que o seguro obrigatório deve ser recolhido junto com a primeira parcela do imposto (para quem dividir o pagamento) ou junto com a cota única.
Para efetuar o pagamento do imposto, basta contribuinte se dirigir a uma agência bancária credenciada, com o número do Renavam (Registro Nacional de Veículo Automotor), e efetuar o recolhimento no guichê de caixa. Os pagamentos também podem ser feitos nos terminais de autoatendimento, pela internet ou débito agendado, ou outros canais oferecidos pela instituição bancária. A lista de bancos credenciados está disponível no site da Secretaria da Fazenda (www3.fazenda.sp.gov.br).
Para obter mais informações a respeito de valores, datas de pagamento e rede bancária autorizada, a Secretaria dispõe de serviço de informação ao cidadão por meio do telefone 0800-170110 e na internet.
Nota Fiscal Paulista
A Secretaria afirma que 314.194 consumidores serão beneficiados pela utilização de créditos da Nota Fiscal Paulista. No total, R$ 57.097.719,27 em créditos serão usados para abater do IPVA de 268.295 veículos. Este abatimento constará do Aviso de Vencimento do IPVA 2011.

description.hltext_display: Google TV Suffers Setback - Analyst Blog
description.content:
Google Inc.’s (GOOG) Google TV has now been around long enough for the geeks to play around with it. And they have come back with disappointing reviews. While most were excited at the concept of wedlock between the TV and Internet, the marriage itself looks destined to be challenging.
An article on allthingsd.com was particularly enlightening, highlighting all the basic problems in the version 1.0 product, from the cumbersome keyboard/controller to the complex navigation. The system tried out was a Logitech set top box (“STB”) and remote control on a Sony Corp (SNE) TV.
Google has kept search as the main feature, enabling users to select a show from not just TV but the whole Internet. Even recorded shows could be searched, provided you were using a Dish Network Corporation (DISH) service.
However, while videos from TV shows on Netflix Inc. (NFLX) and Amazon.com (AMZN) look good, regular Internet videos do not come across very well. Additionally, Google does not support Apple Inc’s (AAPL) iTunes, and the top video networks such as NBC, CBS, ABC and Hulu have blocked it out. So choices, too, are somewhat limited right now. Google intends to bring its Android apps to Google TV with future versions, which would add both features and complexity.
Google TV is also quite expensive, at $300 for a Logitech STB, or $400 for a special blu-ray player, or $600 for a Sony TV with built-in Internet. Competing offerings from Apple and Roku come for just $99 or $60, respectively.
Bad reviews and prices have kept consumers at bay, forcing Google TV to miss what could have been a strong debut this holiday season. Google, for its part, seems well aware of the problem, having delayed the showcasing of Toshiba, LG Electronics and Sharp TVs using its software, although Samsung and Vizio remain on track to launch their versions of Google TV at CES next month.
There are concerns that Google’s sudden change of plans upset build plans for the big TV makers, and Google’s relationships with partners have been called into question. It looks to us to be inexperienced handling of the situation, somewhat different from what we are accustomed to when it comes to Google. Not that anyone has complained.
We remain positive about Google’s TV initiative, as we are positive about its mobile initiative. The company has been going full-throttle in its pursuit of growth, protecting its position in search and also expanding along with the market.
Google’s shares have been allotted a Zacks #2 Rank, implying a short term (1-3 months) Buy recommendation. We are also positive about the company’s prospects in the longer-term and encourage investors to accumulate Google shares.

entity.property: Google TV Suffers Setback - Analyst Blog Google Inc.

description.hltext_display: Brüderle: Null Neuverschuldung beim Bund 2014/15 realistisch
description.content:
Berlin (Reuters) - Die Bundesregierung rechnet mit einem lang anhaltenden Aufschwung und einer Senkung der Neuverschuldung beim Bund auf Null bis spätestens 2015.
"Wir sehen einen nachhaltigen Aufschwung, der durchaus die kommenden Jahre anhalten könnte", sagte Bundeswirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle der "Rheinischen Post" vom Mittwoch. "Angesichts der rückläufigen Bevölkerung in Deutschland und dem Fachkräftemangel in der Wirtschaft könnte es ein Jahrzehnt der Arbeitnehmer werden", fügte der FDP-Politiker hinzu. Sollte sich das Wirtschaftswachstum als robust erweisen, könne die Rückführung der Neuverschuldung auf Null bis 2014 oder 2015 realistisch sein.
Im Übrigen bleibe das Ziel bestehen, die breite Mitte der Bevölkerung steuerlich noch vor der nächsten Bundestagswahl zu entlasten, sagte Brüderle.

description.hltext_display: Bölcskei Gusztáv: a karácsony az egymásra találás ünnepe
description.content:
Az öröm ünnepe közeleg
A karácsony az egymásra találás ünnepe, ez váltja ki az ünnep örömét; egymásra találtak a református magyarok is azáltal, hogy létezik a Kárpát-medencében lévő közösségeket magába foglaló egységes Magyar Református Egyház - mondta Bölcskei Gusztáv püspök, a Magyarországi Református Egyház zsinatának lelkészi elnöke az MTI-nek adott interjújában.
+Nagyobb betűméret-Kisebb betűméret
Mint közölte, karácsony arra emlékeztet, hogy rátaláltak az útra, illetve megtalálták Jézust a születésekor hozzá igyekvők. Ezáltal Isten rátalált az emberre, s karácsony üzenetéből következik, hogy az emberek rátalálhatnak igazi önmagukra, egymásra és Istenre. Nagyon fontos, hogy "az egyház és a nemzet magára találjon, tisztában legyen önmagával, hogy teljes emberi életet élhessen" - hangsúlyozta.
Bölcskei Gusztáv rámutatott arra, hogy "az ünnepet nem lehet megvásárolni", mert annak lényege nem az üzletekben található. A karácsony lényege az, hogy "Isten fia gyermekké lett, hogy te tökéletes felnőtté lehess, bepólyálták, hogy te szabad lehess a halál kötelékétől" - idézte Ambrus, a Kr. u. IV. századi milánói püspök szavait. A református püspök megjegyezte: a gazdasági válság miatt egyre több embernek van szüksége segítségre a hétköznapokban, szeretetszolgálatuk a vilmányi pedagógusoknak is osztott élelmiszert.
A debreceni Nagytemplomban a csomagosztásoknál szembetűnő volt, hogy már a lecsúszóban lévő emberek is sorba álltak, ami jelzi az elszegényedést - tette hozzá. Mint mondta, folytatják a hagyományos tűzifaakciót, a melegtea-járatokat és a szegény gyermekeket támogató Nyilas Misi-programot is.
A szeretetszolgálatnak fel kell készülnie az előre nem látható természeti katasztrófákra is, ennek érdekében professzionális segítő csapatokat kell felállítani, és minden egyházkerületben kell, hogy legyen egy-egy ezzel foglalkozó koordinátor, s Kárpát-medencei szinten is össze kell hangolni ezt a munkát - hangsúlyozta.
Bölcskei Gusztávörömének adott hangot amiatt, hogy a református egyház a többi történelmi egyháznál jóval magasabb mértékben tudta növelni a személyi jövedelemadóból érkező felajánlásokat, mind az összeget, mind a felajánlók számát tekintve. Úgy véli, ez összefüggésben van azzal, hogy az egyház erősítette szeretetszolgálati tevékenységét, mert így a nem hívőkhöz is eljutottak.
Véleménye szerint az egyháznak hallatnia kell a hangját az embereket hátrányosan érintő állami intézkedések esetén, például akkor, amikor a kistelepülések iskoláit bezárják, vagy amikor a kettős állampolgárságból fakadó hátrányokkal "riogatják" a társadalmat.
A jövő év feladatának nevezte, hogy a kiegyensúlyozott, hosszú távú egyházfinanszírozás részleteiben megállapodjanak az állammal. Ugyanakkor sürgető kérdésnek mondta a kormány által az egyházi kórházaknak már hónapokkal ezelőtt odaítélt 688 millió forint átutalását. Fontosnak nevezte, hogy a 2011-es költségvetésben rögzítsék: az egyházi kórházaknak jár kiegészítő normatíva. Bölcskei Gusztáv úgy fogalmazott: minél hamarabb rendezni kell a "bizniszegyházak" kérdését, és noha erre tett ígéretet az egyházügyi államtitkárság, nem látják ezen a téren az eredményeket. A helyzet tisztázása azonban indokolt az egyházi intézményrendszer fenntartásának stabilitása érdekében és azért is, hogy ne lehessen egy egyház nevével visszaélni - indokolta a kérdés rendezésének szükségességét. Elmondta, hogy újra megjelent a költségvetésben az egyházi épületek felújítására szánt rekonstrukciós keret, az összegek szétosztása azonban az államtitkárság feladata lesz. Ez utóbbit tudomásul veszik, de nem örülnek neki, mert tapasztalataik szerint "nem biztos, hogy az az eljárás a jó, amikor az egyházat egy-egy döntésből kihagyják". Arra viszont ígéretük van, hogy egyeztetnek velük ez ügyben is - fűzte hozzá. Bölcskei Gusztáv utalt arra, hogy a hittanoktatás és a kistelepülési támogatás összege körül még nem látnak tisztán a jövő évi költségvetést illetően, de "jó érzéssel és megnyugvással veszik tudomásul, hogy működőképességük biztosítva van".
Ezenkívül keresik például a szociális ellátás vagy a cigánymisszió területén lévő előrelépési lehetőségeket. A cigánymisszió keretében létrehoztak egy "freskófalut", ahol a helyi cigány embereknek lehetőséget adtak művészetük, kultúrájuk kiteljesítésére.
Emellett több mint húsz helyen hoztak létre a cigányság számára tanodákat, s tervezik egy roma szakkollégiumi hálózat beindítását is. Ez segíthet a kölcsönös előítéletek leküzdésében - tette hozzá.
Az egységes Magyar Református Egyház jeles eseményeként említette, hogy november 16-án emléktáblát avattak a zsúfolásig megtelt gyulafehérvári székesegyházban a református Bethlen Gábor erdélyi fejedelem tiszteletére. Ő az a történelmi személyiség volt, aki megőrizte Erdély relatív függetlenségét, támogatta a katolikus Káldi György bibliafordítását, ő fordíttatta le először román nyelvre a Szentírást, és megtiltotta, hogy zsidó származású embereknek megkülönböztető jelet kelljen hordaniuk a ruhájukon - ismertette a püspök.
Történelmi jelentőségűnek mondta, hogy a generális konvent a legújabb kori történelmük során először tanácskozott a határon túl, Révkomáromban, ami "nagyon jótékony hatással volt az ottani feszült magyar-szlovák viszonyra is", jövőre pedig a tervek szerint ez a plénum Temesváron ülésezik majd. Szeretethíd nevű programjuk önkéntes ifjúsági munkája szintén átível a határokon - említette meg a zsinat lelkészi elnöke.
Bölcskei Gusztáv beszámolt arról, hogy az önkéntesség 2011-es évének európai uniós programjaihoz egyházuk is csatlakozik, s a soros EU-elnökséget betöltő Magyarországért mondják el majd imáikat január 16-án az ökumenikus imahét ünnepélyes megnyitóján. Ez alkalomból az Európai Egyházak Konferenciájának vezetői Budapesten találkoznak majd magyar politikusokkal és egyházi vezetőkkel.

description.hltext_display: Area sports briefs: Carson girls in a big one tonight
description.content:
OK, Carson girls. Let’s see what you’ve got.
Brooke Misenheimer’s upstart Cougars have an early first-place North Piedmont Conference showdown tonight at North Iredell.
Carson (7-2, 3-0) lost its first two games of the season but has reeled off seven straight wins, including an exciting 73-58 triumph against West Rowan on Friday.
North Iredell (7-1, 2-0) is the defending champion and was an overwhelming preseason favorite to repeat. But the Raiders are hurting. In a rout of South Rowan last week, center Brooke Redmond, the Raiders’ leading rebounder, went down with a high ankle sprain and is expected to be out for two to three weeks, according to coach Tami Ramsey.
• The West Rowan boys also have a first-place battle tonight when the Falcons (3-5, 2-0) travel to Statesville 5-2, 2-0).
Mike Gurley’s team has gotten one of his two top players back from football. B.J. Sherrill has recovered from a concussion suffered in the 3A state championship victory over Eastern Alamance. He played last night against North Rowan.
Dominique Noble, a 6-foot-2 inside player, was a member of the North Carolina Shrine Bowl team and also will pla in the Offense-Defense All-American game in a couple of weeks in Myrtle Beach. Gurley expects Noble to be available for hoops Jan. 4.
• The third 2-0 boys team in the NPC is North Iredell (4-4 overall), and Carson (3-6, 1-2) hopes to derail the Raiders tonight in Olin.
• South Rowan coach John Davis thought his team should’ve beaten North Iredell last week and South (2-6, 0-1) now tries to even its NPC mark at home against West Iredell (4-4, 1-2).
• The West Rowan girls (6-2, 1-1) should have no trouble with hapless Statesville (0-7, 0-2) and South Rowan’s girls (3-5, 0-1) should be favored at home against West Iredell (1-7, 1-2). The Warriors’ only victory came last week when they stunned East Rowan.
• In the South Piedmont Conference, A.L. Brown’s boys (6-2, 2-0) are playing well heading into a game against Cox Mill (3-6, 1-1). Teven Jones is one of the area’s best players.
The A.L. Brown girls (4-4, 1-1) are favored against Cox Mill (1-7, 0-2).
• In the Central Piedmont 4A, the talk has been about Mike Absher’s Davie County War Eagles. They are 8-0 overall headed into tonight’s game at Thomasville (2-4, 0-0). Last week, Davie exploded past the Bulldogs 93-54 in Mocksville.
• Wednesday’s game between East Rowan and Salisbury has been postponed.
n Wonders sweep
Anson County came in with a gameplan to stop A.L. Brown’s leading scorer Teven Jones on Monday.
The Bearcats accomplished that feat, holding Jones to just six points. He fouled out with six minutes left.
But Anson didn’t stop the other Wonders. Brown won 62-55 .
Derrick Copeland led Shelwyn Klutz’s team with 14 points, while sophomore Keeon Johnson had his second straight big game with 13 points and 16 rebounds. Parish Smith added 12 for A.L. Brown (6-2).
“It was a great team win for us,” said Klutz.
The A.L. Brown girls evened their overall record at 4-4 with a 53-39 win against Anson County on Monday.
The Wonders were led by Zebresha Blakeney with 15 points. Raven Phifer had 12 and Aaliyah Spears added eight.
n North Hills boys win
North Hills got 28 points from Oshon West and rolled past Hickory Grove 71-44 on Monday.
The Eagles outscored their opponent 55-17 in the second half.
“We had a lot of early foul trouble in the first half which kept us from getting out in transition,” coach Jason Causby said.[0xa0]“We made some defensive adjustments at the half which enabled us to get some stops and push the ball into the open court.”
West may have had the points, but the point-guard play of Justin Wright was the difference.[0xa0]
“I thought Justin played his best game at the point,” Causby said. “He was very deliberate in making us run our sets in the half court and passing the ball ahead on the break to the correct open man.[0xa0]
[0xa0]West was helped by Wright, who scored 18, and Moussa Doucara, who pitched in with 11. Wright also dished out 10 assists.
West had his best game of the season, going 5 for 6 from 3-point land.[0xa0]
“However, I was more proud of when and where his shots came from and the effort he exerted on the defensive end,” Causby said. “O is beginning to exert some positive leadership as well.”[0xa0]
North Hills plays today at 3:30 against Veritas Christian.
n Middle School hoops
The Sacred Heart jayvee boys basketball team lost 24-22 to Our Lady of Mercy.
Sacred Heart (7-3) was led by Michael Childress with 13 points, all in the second half.
Adam Habeeb had five points and five rebounds. James Boyd had seven rebounds. Brian Reid had a game high 11 rebounds. Justin Boyd had five steals.
n Minor leagues
Julio Vinas has been named manager of the Winston-Salem Dash.
Gary Ward, a longtime major leaguer, will be the hitting coach, while former All-Star closer Bobby Thigpen returns as pitching coach.
Second baseman Daniel Wagner (South Rowan), who had a good year with the Kannapolis Intimidators in 2010, is expected to start the 2011 season in advanced A ball with Winston-Salem.

description.hltext_display: Gaining an Edge on Paying it Safe
description.content:
Earlier this year, a report from SpiderLabs came up with the startling fact that data within hotel computer systems were breached more than in financial institutions in 2009 and that nearly all the attacks were targeted at the repository of payment-card data.
In fact, the ratio of attacks in the hotel industry (38%) was exactly double that of those in the financial industry (19%).That unsurprising conclusion was on the heels of reports of one of the largest credit-card data compromises for a hotel chain when a hacker put eight million people at risk of ID fraud by selling the details to the Russian mafia.
The New York Times ran a report explaining why hackers went after hotels more so than other industries including retail. The self-evident reason offered was that "hackers hit hotels because that is where the richest vein of personal credit card data is.
At hotels with inadequate data security the greatest amount of credit card information can be obtained using the most simplified methods." The industry remains a step behind the hackers who employ sophisticated sytems that vary depening on the targeted hotel/s. Unhelpful to the process of thwarting the cyber-thieves is the peripatetic nature of hotel clients, many of whom fail to check their credit card statements early and often enough resulting in long lead times for the perpertrators to salt away their ill-gotten gains.
Add to that is the recent trend in frugality brought on by the recession of guests using debit cards instead of credit cards which puts customers at greater risks should they have large amounts in their bank accounts.
While many hotel companies have undertaken plans to implement new technology the failure to disclose, at least in broad stokes, those steps to the traveling public is arguably a disservice and does nothing to instill consumer confidence. Mercifully, there have been no reported attacks in the last 5-6 but it is unlikely the hackers are reposing quietly.
Nevertheless, recent technological innovation, outside the hospitality industry, is likely to enable hoteliers to keep one step ahead of those looking to purloin credit-card data.
One such innovation is by Akamai, a leading web-services and content delivery technology company. Akamai is planning to launch its secure e-payment solutions early next year in the Asia-Pacific region, with Singapore as the hub.
The service will enable any online merchanto convert credit card data to a token on Akamai's cloud which will make it harder, though not impossible, for data-thieves to access the information. Named Akamai Edge Tokenisation, the e-payment security service will offer automatic compliance with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.
Akamai's executive noted that "this service is a game changer that will free merchants from an environment where credit card information is stored in local data centres, at high risk of being stolen by data thieves."
While it is appears to be a significant technological lead forward in terms of a barrier to data theft, hospitality companies will need to retool PMSs and CRS systems to ensure that guest data that necessarily will remain in them for marketing and CRM purposes is bereft of the critical piece, credit card numbers, sought by cyber-hackers.
Vijay is Chief Operating Officer and part-founder of Apple Core Hotels- a chain of 5 midtown Manhattan hotels offering value and comfort in the heart of the city.Member of the board of Directors - Hotel Association of New York.

description.hltext_display: Market Focus with Tom Hudson
description.content:
SUSIE GHARIB: By looking at the chart, you can see the pop in financials. Shares of the ETF (XLF) that tracks the big financials rose nearly 2 percent today. And besides that TD Bank deal that we told you about, lots of market buzz about other takeovers. Let's look at Royal DSM. That's the Dutch Life Sciences Group. It's offering more than a billion dollars for Marteck Biosciences (MATK). That's a U.S.-based nutrition firm. Looking at the shares of Martek, they surged on the news, up 35 percent to $31.67. Royal DSM by the way wants to expand into infant formula and dietary supplements.
Now the world' biggest lock maker is breaking into a new security business. This is Assa Abloy and it's paying $80 million for Lasercard (LCRD). That's an identity security firm. That works out to about $6.25 a share, a 40 percent premium to yesterday's closing price. And that's just about where Lasercard shares closed the day -- $6.24 a share.
AIG (AIG) also in the news today. The U.S. government gave more details on its plan to exit the bailed-out insurer. The U.S. Treasury says it will sell a large chunk of its stake in two stock offerings next year. That helped AIG move higher, up $1.76. That works out to 6 percent on the news.
A couple of big stock moves on earnings news to tell you about. First up, let's talk about Nike (NKE). Its shares plunged in after-hours trading and that's even though the sports apparel maker posted a 22 percent jump in quarterly earnings today and the company also said future orders are strong, up 11 percent. Nike earned $0.94 a share. That beat expectations. Revenues came in around $5 billion also slightly better than estimates. But despite all of that good news, Nike stock hit an all -- fell during regular trading, Nike stock hit an all-time high of $92.
Let's take a look at Carnival (CCL). That's another earnings story to tell you about. The latest results show smooth sailing for the big cruise line and that's thanks to an improving economy and savings on its fuel bill. Carnival earned $0.31 a share in its fourth quarter. That was right in line with what analysts were expecting. Revenues rose almost 7 percent and the stock cruising up by almost 5 percent, you can see it there, to a 52-week high of $45.18.
Solid earnings news from Jabil Circuit (JBL) today. It's a company that makes circuit boards that are used in everything from computers to telecom equipment. It earned $0.61 a share. That was $0.07 more than estimates and looking at this chart, you can tell that investors liked the numbers. The stock rose 11 percent to $19.55, that's its highest level in three years. Adobe (ADBE) shares also moved higher, up 6 percent. You remember that we told you yesterday, the software giant swung to a fourth quarter profit.
And we see here Darden Restaurants (DRI) falling nearly 6 percent. As we reported last night, its quarterly earnings jumped 24 percent, but the stock sold off on concerns that the competition is gaining ground on Darden's chains like the Olive Garden and Red Lobster.
And wrapping up here, we're one step closer to restarting rare earth mineral mining right here in the U.S. California-based Molycorp (MCP) inked a deal today with Japan's Hitachi metals for a joint venture right here in the U.S. They're going to work together to produce rare earth alloys and magnets that are used in high-tech products from cell phones to satellites. Molycorp shares surged on the news, up 13 percent or more than $5 and that works out to a 52-week high.
And that is tonight's "Market Focus."

description.hltext_display: China says Vatican criticism 'imprudent and ungrounded'
description.content:
BEIJING, (AFP) - China on Wednesday rejected as "imprudent and ungrounded" the Vatican's criticism of a high-level meeting of its official Catholic Church, which is not recognised by the pope, state media said.
The statement from the country's State Administration for Religious Affairs came after the Vatican accused China of "unacceptable and hostile acts" that provoked "a grave loss of trust", following the assembly of Chinese bishops.
"The Vatican's behaviour is very imprudent and ungrounded," Xinhua news agency quoted a spokesman for the administration as saying.

description.hltext_display: Sacred Heart rally falls short; Bike fails to win No. 500
description.content:
PROVIDENCE, R.I. -- Marshon Brooks scored 19 of his team-high 23 points in the first half and Providence overcame a career-high 26 points by Shane Gibson and a late Sacred Heart comeback to score an 84-76 non-conference victory Tuesday night.
Providence of the Big East (11-2) built a 12-point lead against the Pioneers of the Northeast Conference with 12:03 left and then had to survive the late charge that twice brought Sacred Heart (4-8) to within three points. The Providence lead was cut to 77-74 with 1:08 left before the Friars beat the press, fed Bilal Dixon for slam dunk and earned some breathing room.
The loss, which ended the Pioneers' three-game winning streak, kept Sacred Heart coach Dave Bike from reaching the 500-win plateau, his first shot at the milestone. Bike is No. 20 among active coaches in wins and the loss was his 451st.
PROVIDENCE (11-2)
Brooks 9-15 4-4 25, Batts 2-4 5-7 9, Dixon 5-5 1-3 11, Coleman 3-4 1-2 8, Council 5-13 5-6 16, Mondy 3-7 0-0 8, Evans 0-2 0-0 0, Giplaye 0-0 4-8 4, Goldsbrough 1-1 0-1 3, Cotton 0-2 0-0 0, Hall 0-0 0-0 0. Totals 28-53 20-31 84.
Halftime--Providence 44-41. 3-Point Goals--Sacred Heart 7-18 (Gibson 6-9, Montes 1-3, Kelley 0-3, Thompson 0-3), Providence 8-23 (Brooks 3-5, Mondy 2-6, Coleman 1-1, Goldsbrough 1-1, Council 1-5, Batts 0-1, Cotton 0-2, Evans 0-2). Fouled Out--None. Rebounds--Sacred Heart 29 (Dulaire 9), Providence 37 (Brooks 12). Assists--Sacred Heart 15 (Dulaire, Kelley, Thompson 3), Providence 16 (Brooks, Council 5). description.hltext_display: Coupons For Online Shopping
description.author: karlomcknight
description.content:
Online shopping is the talk of the town nowadays, but the dissimilarity is that you really do not need to go to the city to purchase! What makes sites like eBay and Amazon.com so popular is because they offer many varieties from gadgets to personal care products so you have a wide array of choices. Another reason is because you don’t have to spend time and effort to go to the shop or store personally to look for something you want, all you need is the internet!
Today, online shopping is more fun with the use of online coupons. Online coupons offer a number of companies and essentially provide a lot of offers, such as discounts and freebies. To make it work, you must first determine whether the coupon codes that show special offers and discounts on stuff you want to buy. Just make use of Google to find it out.
Purchasing things through the link, often come with coupons beats around 20 to 40% discount on the actual cost. Once you have your coupons, the rest is simple. The first important thing is to check the expiration date, and if it is still valid, you can use to your advantage. Everything you need to do is punch in the code that comes with the coupon in the space for it. And you get discounts and special offers that fit your coupon.
Occasionally you may encounter websites that provide coupons that are impressive. You can also subscribe to newsletters or websites that informs you of good coupons are available. So you get a stable understanding of what is available on how many discount and what other offers are available. Then it would be a good thing to register in such a newsletter.
You can save a lot of your cash and still have quality stuff if you do it that way. Except for the expiration date to something else, you must be careful to check if the ticket is authentic. Some may be fraudulent, but the real coupon codes, so traders by providing real rewards impressive.

description.hltext_display: Prep Basketball: Northwest Cabarrus boys 79, Salisbury 63
description.content:
KANNAPOLIS — Salisbury spent the first three minutes of the fourth quarter erasing a six-point deficit to Northwest Cabarrus, with John Knox's 3-pointer tying the game at 60.
Before the Hornets could get possession of the ball again, though, they actually trailed by more than six.
A pair of technical fouls on Darien Rankin led to an eight-point Northwest possession and Salisbury never recovered, falling to the Trojans 79-63 Monday night in a nonconference contest between two shorthanded teams.
"Sometimes when you come out flat on a Monday and you're not ready to play, you can slip up and lose one that you hope you can win," Salisbury coach Justin Morgan said. "We fought back a little bit. We've just to learn that whenever things get tough to continue to play hard and overcome adversity."
Knox scored 22 points to lead the Hornets (3-3), who played without senior Alex Weant (death in the family). Corey Murphy stepped up with 18 points off the bench, but it wasn't enough to overcome a poor third quarter for Salisbury.
Despite playing without two starters due to illness — including Corey Seager — Northwest outscored the Hornets 25-13 in the third, and then pulled away after Rankin was ejected.
Guards Arian Wallace and Ameer Jackson picked up the slack for the Trojans (4-4), scoring 25 and 18 points.
Salisbury led 39-33 at the break, but Northwest scored the first 11 points of the second half with help from several Salisbury turnovers.
An alley-oop dunk by Rankin off a pass by Knox midway through the quarter made it 46-44 Northwest, but the Trojans then ran off nine more points in a row, capped by Wallace's fourth 3-pointer of the game. He totaled 24 of his points in the first three periods.
"They had a couple good shooters that we didn't get out on and that hurt us," Morgan said. "We got back in the game by playing good defense, but we didn't put a whole game together defensively."
Indeed Salisbury did step up its defensive pressure at that point, forcing numerous turnovers late in the quarter that helped close the gap to 58-52 on a layup by Rankin.
The Hornets started the fourth with the more of the same as Murphy converted a reverse layup off a steal. Forrest Wilkins then hit a 3-pointer and Knox made his third 3 of the game which evened the score with 5:20 left.
Then came the critical possession. A rather harmless foul call on the Hornets underneath was compounded by Rankin drawing the back-to-back technicals for complaining to the referee.
Northwest's David Broome (17 points) hit the two free throws for the shooting foul and Jackson followed with four more for the technicals. The Trojans then took the ball out of bounds and Jackson scored on a driving layup and just like that it was 68-60.
"That was big in a lot of ways," Northwest coach Daniel Jenkins said. "I know (Rankin) is their leader and he's their guy that they look to a lot and when you don't have that guy on the floor, it doesn't just hurt you by giving us points, but it hurts in a lot of other ways."
Jackson hit a three-pointer on the next possession to make it 71-60 with 4:05 left and the Hornets didn't threaten again as they went ice-cold from the perimeter after making six 3-pointers in the first half.
"We let those get to us," Knox said. "When we got the technicals, it was like the whole team just gave up and didn't want to play anymore.
"That hurt us big-time. As the season goes on we've got to learn to play with adversity like that. We've got to stay with our game even with the bad calls or whatever the situation is."
Morgan himself was hit with a technical in the third quarter.
"It was tough," he said. "Whenever we let our emotions get out of control, myself included, sometimes its hard to get things regrouped."
Rankin finished the game with 15 points, but Salisbury didn't make another basket after he left the game.
"We played hard in spurts tonight," Morgan said. "We've just got to learn to compete and play hard the entire game and put a whole game together."
"We've got to get back to practice and work on our improving our defense, and our offense will key off of that.
•
NOTES: Murphy scored 13 of his points in the second quarter, including nine in a row to end the period.... Morgan expects Weant to be back at practice today.... The Hornets don't play again until the Sam Moir Christmas Tournament on Tuesday.
SALISBURY (63) — Knox 22, Murphy 18, Rankin 15, Wilkins 3, McCain 2, Rivens 2, Morris 1, Petty.
NORTHWEST CABARRUS (79) — Wallace 25, Jackson 18, Broome 17, Rohan 8, Kingston 7, Pinion 2, Rhinehart 2, Miller.
Salisbury 18 21 13 11 — 63
NWC 19 14 25 21 — 79

They had a couple good shooters that we didn't get out on and that hurt us; We got back in the game by playing good defense, but we didn't put a whole game together defensively.
