description.hltext_display: Flight chaos due to 'official's stuff-up'
description.content:
Video Image Australians trapped for days in snow chaos at Londons Heathrow Airport are finally starting to arrive home.
ndm.media.loadvcms.articleplayer("1705898639"); Workers try to clear the snow at London's Heathrow Airport. Picture: Steve Parsons Source: AP Heathrow Airport owners blamed for delays Accused of not buying enough de-icing fluid First few Australians arrive home HEATHROW Airport owners did not buy enough de-icing fluid to keep its two runways open, stranding hundreds of thousands of passengers, angry airline bosses said. The airports second runway has recently reopened - but only after the UK government intervened to ensure more snow-clearing supplies were drafted in, aviation insiders told The London Times.
Thousands of passengers remain waiting in Heathrow terminals, conference halls and hotels.
Bosses were hopeful that more flights would be able to operate Wednesday, raising expectations for some of the 573,000 people booked to fly through Heathrow before Christmas.
However, up to two thirds of passengers are not scheduled to fly until Thursday at the earliest, forcing many to stay in London over the holiday period or find alternative routes.
Their despair is matched by that of the airlines using the airport, which have contradicted official statements from BAA - Heathrows owner - that the airport had enough de-icer to cope. What is really incredible is that 10cm of snow closed the airport down for two days and then it operated at one-third capacity. It is completely unacceptable, Wolfgang Prock-Schauer, the chief executive of BMI, told The Times. BAA was not prepared. It did not have enough de-icing fluid. The Prime Minister has stepped in and de-icing fluid has been released from other sources. This should have been possible without this kind of intervention. An executive from another leading airline said: I do not think they have the resources to do it in terms of de-icing the runway. Heathrow had earlier turned down an offer for the Army to dig snow away. BAA, which also owns five other airports, insisted that it did have enough de-icing fluid, although a spokesman was unable to say how much was kept in reserve or how much had been used during the very cold weather.
Another senior airline executive said: Everybody is boiling with frustration. Over the weekend there was a tangible lack of urgency and the problems we are experiencing now are a direct consequence of that initial 24 hours when they seemed paralysed. Gatwick prepared to handle 100,000 passengers Tuesday, but warned of delays and cancellations to some flights.
The European Commission denounced the unacceptable disruption to air travel in Britain, France, Belgium, Germany and other countries since the weekend.
Siim Kallas, the EU Transport Commissioner, summoned airport managers from across Europe to explain why they had been so ill-prepared for the snow. The commission is considering EU-wide legislation to make airports guarantee a minimum service.Aussies finally home
Meanwhile, the first few Australians to have made it back home after being stranded in the UK by Arctic conditions today described nightmare conditions at London's airports.
Those lucky enough to get on a flight to Australia said they were relieved to be back home as they arrived at Sydney airport this morning "It was like a scene from a film," said Stephanie Lake of the chaos at Heathrow on her arrival in Sydney this morning. "I'm one of the lucky ones. So many people were turned away ... you couldn't actually get into the airport unless your flight was confirmed, so there were people outside in that freezing cold, wrapped in silver foil sheets." A fellow British Airways passenger, who gave his name as Todd, said he couldn't wait for some warmth and a beer after spending two days "juggling" bookings from Heathrow to "anywhere in Australia" after three of his flights with other airlines were cancelled due to the freezing British weather. "It's such a bloody relief to be home," he said. Some passengers aboard Virgin flight VS200 into Sydney said "media hype" had made them worried about the chances of getting away from Heathrow, but they were delayed only 90 minutes. "I guess we are the most extremely fortunate to actually be able to get onto a flight," said Alex Horton, 19, who returned from a gap-year spent in the southern county of Hampshire. "I'd heard before we got to (Heathrow) that it was pretty chaotic, and they weren't wrong." Happy to have escaped Heathrow and arrived in Sydney, travellers said the best advice they could give those still in London and bound for Australia, was to check airline and airport websites before leaving home.
Heathrow, Europe's busiest airport, is operating only about one third of its usual number of flights.
Some passengers have been stranded at the airport since Saturday, camping on temporary mattresses.
Others have been forced to queue outside in the freezing cold.
Cancelled flights operated by Qantas:BA16 Sydney - Singapore 16:25 (Tue)QF319 Sydney - Singapore 16:25 (Tue)BA16 Singapore - London (Heathrow) 23:20 (Tue)QF319 Singapore - London (Heathrow) 23:20 (Tue)QF1 Sydney - Bangkok 18:05 (Tue)BA7311 Sydney - Bangkok 18:05 (Tue)IB7704 Sydney - Bangkok 18:05 (Tue)QF1 Bangkok - London (Heathrow) 00:45 BA7311 Bangkok - London (Heathrow) 00:45IB7704 Bangkok - London (Heathrow) 00:45QF1 Bangkok - London (Heathrow) 04:40 (Thu)BA7311 Bangkok - London (Heathrow) 04:40 (Thu)IB7704 Bangkok - London (Heathrow) 04:40 (Thu)

description.hltext_display: Jarige Borsato feest met Clouseau
description.content: Alsof de gastoptredens van Bart Peeters, Jan Leyers en Natalia nog niet genoeg waren. Marco Borsato vierde zijn 44ste verjaardag niet met zijn met vrienden uit het Gooise Blaricum, maar met Clouseau in het Antwerpse Sportpaleis. 'Heel bijzonder', vond de Nederlander dat. Clouseau covert tijdens de afscheidsreeks De Laatste Ronde elke dag een ander Nederlandstalig nummer, telkens gekozen door de lezers van Q-Music. Gisteren was dat Binnen, de meebruller van Marco Borsato. Halfweg het nummer zorgde Koen Wauters voor een verrassing van formaat. Hij riep Marco Borsato op het podium, en die kwam de rest van het liedje meezingen. Daarna deden de twee er nog eentje bij: Nee je hoeft niet naar huis vannacht. Toen Marco tien minuten later van het podium stapte, was de zaal compleet zot. En ze gingen helemaal uit hun dak toen Marco besloot met de woorden: 'Vriendschap is een mooi goed. Bedankt voor jullie vriendschap de voorbije jaren.' Veertienduizend mensen die een kaartje hadden gekocht voor nkel Clouseau, kregen er dus behalve de drie vaste special guests nog een extra van formaat bij. Goed gezien natuurlijk van Borsato: op (voorlopig) 17, 18, 20 en 21 mei staat hij zlf in Het Sportpaleis. 'Koen, Kris en ik zijn de afgelopen jaren echte vrienden geworden', zegt Marco. 'We hebben samen veel meegemaakt en we gingen naar elkaars concerten. En als Kris en ik samen jarig waren, zoals vandaag, belden we altijd wel eens.' 'Ik kon niet nee zeggen toen Kris me belde met de vraag of ik wilde komen meedoen op mijn verjaardag. Natuurlijk wilde ik. Die mannen lopen hun laatste rondje. Die sluiten een ongelofelijke periode af. Daar wil je toch bij zijn? Ik heb genoten. Toen ik Koen mijn liedje hoorde inzetten, en ik nog twee minuten beneden aan het trapje moest blijven staan, voelde ik me net een stier die de arena niet in mocht. En het was zo voorbij. Het was als een amuusje. Je mag even proeven, en dan moet je weer het podium af.' Dat Marco gisteren moest optreden op zijn 44ste verjaardag vond hij niet erg. 'Ik ben gewekt met ontbijt op bed door Leontien en de kinderen. Daarna kreeg ik cadeaus. Ze hadden samen een kerststal voor me geknutseld. En daarna naar Antwerpen voor een etentje met mijn vrouw, even zingen met goeie vrienden, en dan nog op hotel met je meissie. Kan je mooier hebben?' Ook Kris Wauters mocht een extra kaarsje uitblazen. De oudste broer werd gisteren 46. 'Dat is de ware reden waarom we stoppen. We worden gewoon te oud.' (lacht) Onze zanger is ook al 43 jaar.'

description.hltext_display: 新娘补妆技巧
description.content:
预防贴士：在涂眼影之前先在下眼睑上涂抹遮瑕膏，这� �万一弄脏了，也能轻松刷掉。或者在上眼影时，用纸巾在下面垫着。另外，不妨选用细腻如粉的眼影膏，不但上色度好，也绝不会“掉渣” 啦。
妆面有点脏兮兮
技巧：出油的部分先用纸巾擦干净，轻轻擦上少量粉底或轻扫一点修颜粉。重新修补妆面，提亮肤色，记得时常喷点温泉水喷雾。
预防贴士：上粉底之前先仔细地抹好日霜，用特殊的妆前乳等新产品打底，就能让妆容更持久。
忘记带口红了技巧：唇膏的颜色� 乎掉光了，唇线还残留着(吃饭的时候常会发生这种事)，赶快抹上滋润的润唇膏或多功能乳霜，把唇线的颜色从边缘抹到整个唇部。
预防贴士：唇线笔不要只勾画唇的轮廓，整个唇部都用唇线笔涂一遍。这� �就算唇膏的颜色掉了，也不会尴尬。指甲油剥落
花妆技巧：如果斑驳的指甲油不易剥除，家里又找不到洗甲水，那么只好用指甲油修补。更彻底的方法就是：覆盖厚厚一层指甲油，过10秒钟后用纸巾擦去。这个办法能把原来的指甲油也一并卸掉，现在� 就可以涂层新的了。预防贴士：多花一点精力，就会达到意想不到效果：在涂指甲油之前先泖一层护甲油，之后再涂一层亮油。这� �做不仅甲油不易剥落，使用颜色鲜艳的指甲油时也不用担心颜色会污染了，一举两得！

description.hltext_display: Noël 2010 : les fers à boucler
description.author: Hélène
description.content:
Pour qu'elle soit la plus belle à Noël, offrez-lui un fer à boucler à l'aide duquel elle pourra créer des boucles souples et naturelles, pour un look tendance et sophistiqué ou naturellement bouclé! Voici les nouveautés 2010 en termes de fers à boucler.
Calor CF6510C4 Curl Activ
Avec le fer à boucler Calor CF6510C4 Curl Activ, vous pourrez changer de coiffure et entretenir de belles boucles au quotidien. Sa température constante réglable de 90 à 210°C s’adapte à tous les types de cheveux. Le Calor CF6510C4 Curl Activ est équipé d’un système de rotation automatique pour enrouler facilement la mèche autour du fer. Les 2 sens de rotation gauche et droite permettent de réaliser toutes sortes de coiffures toutes plus originales les unes que les autres. Ultrarapide, ce fer à boucler de Calor est utilisable en 90 secondes grâce à sa mise à température très efficace. Prix : à partir de 47,90 €.
Remington Ci95
Le fer à boucler conique Pearl CI95 de Remington garantit une chevelure plus brillante grâce à son revêtement Advanced Ceramic. Ce système unique favorise la répartition uniforme de la chaleur sur toute la surface chauffante et rend les cheveux plus doux et soyeux. Sa température est réglable de 130 à 210°C. La mise à disposition est rapide puisque l’appareil est prêt à fonctionner au bout de 30 secondes. Le fer à boucler Ci95muni de Remington est muni d’un arrêt automatique après 60 minutes pour un maximum de sécurité. Sa pochette thermo-résistante permet de le transporter dans n’importe quel sac et à tout moment de la journée. Prix : à partir de 28 €.
Babyliss AS 100 E
Le Babyliss AS100E est une brosse soufflante d’une puissance de 1 000 Watts qui assure un séchage et un brushing impeccable en un seul geste. Grâce à l’accessoire spécial boucle, vous pourrez réaliser des boucles à l’infini. Ses 3 vitesses et 3 niveaux de température s’adaptent à tous les types de cheveux et à toutes les coiffures. Le fer à boucler AS 100 E de Babyliss est équipé d’une fonction ionique pour éliminer l’électricité statique des cheveux. La touche air frais permet de fixer durablement la coiffure. Prix : à partir de 29,90 €.
Russell Hobbs 18005-56
Le fer à boucler Russell Hobbs 18005-56 permet de réaliser de jolies boucles souples et naturelles en un tour de main. Son revêtement Céramique-Tourmaline respecte la nature de vos cheveux et élimine les frisottis pour laisser place à des cheveux lisses et soyeux. Grâce à sa puissance de 32 Watts, ce fer à boucler garantit un résultat rapide et toujours réussi. Ce fer est en outre muni d’une fonction ionique et vapeur afin de modeler et de respecter au maximum vos cheveux. Prix : 12,97 €.
Philips SimplySalon Curl HP 8600/00
Le fer Philips SimplySalon Curl HP 8600/00 vous garantit des boucles réussies et longue tenue sans efforts. Le revêtement Céramique-Tourmaline offre une brillance accrue et une température homogène tout au long du coiffage pour respecter et protéger les cheveux. Ce fer à coiffer d’un diamètre de 23 mm permet de réaliser de jolies boucles en toute simplicité grâce à sa pince spéciale qui facilite le relâchement des boucles. Prix : à partir de 16,99 €.
©Idealo News, le 22 décembre 2010

description.hltext_display: شركات الأسمنت تبدأ التوزيع النقدى لتنشيط الأسهم
description.content:
الأربعاء، 22 ديسمبر 2010 - 08:48
صورة أرشيفية
كتب محمود عسكر
أعلنت كل من شركة السويس للأسمنت، وشركة أسمنت بورتلاند طره عن توزيع كل منها كوبون للمساهمين بقيمة جنيه لكل سهم، فى توجه يبدو أنه أصبح وسيلة لتنشيط أسهمها التى تواجه موجة من التراجع فى الفترة الحالية، حيث تراجع سهم أسمنت بورتلاند خلال جلسة أمس فقط بنسبة 4.70%، كما تراجع سهم السويس للأسمنت بنسب 0.08%.
وأرسلت شركة السويس للأسمنت خطاباً إلى البورصة فى 8 ديسمبر قررت البورصة بمقتضاه توزيع الكوبون رقم (23) بواقع 1 جنيه للسهم الواحد وذلك اعتباراً 23 ديسمبر 2010، وبالتالى ينتقل الحق فى التوزيع لمشترى السهم حتى نهاية جلسة يوم الاثنين 20 ديسمبر 2010.
كما أرسلت شركة أسمنت بورتلاند طره المصرية خطاباً فى نفس التوقيت تقرر بمقتضاه توزيع الكوبون رقم (17) بواقع 1 جنيه للسهم الواحد وذلك اعتباراً من23 ديسمبر 2010، وبالتالى ينتقل الحق فى التوزيع لمشترى السهم حتى نهاية جلسة يوم الاثنين 20 ديسمبر 2010.

description.hltext_display: Unemployment rate for young people highest in decades
description.author: Greg Griffin
description.content:
/scriptColorado Christian University senior Russell Dornisch, shown in the school library, worries about getting a job after he graduates. He hasn't even been able to find a part-time fast-food or retail job. (Karl Gehring, The Denver Post ) if(requestedWidth 0)}
The unemployment rate among young people including teens and those in their early 20s is at its highest level in decades, though there are signs that improved holiday hiring is easing the problem.
Many of the part-time and seasonal jobs traditionally filled by high school and college students cashiers, fast-food cooks and stockers are being taken by adults who can't find higher-paying work and face high unemployment levels themselves.
Russell Dornisch, 21, who's studying communications at Colorado Christian University in Lakewood, hasn't been able to find any part-time work for months. The Caon City native is living off student loans. He worries that he may not be able to find work once he graduates in May and will have to move back in with his parents.
"I started this summer and applied for 75 jobs. Not big-time jobs retail, fast food. I got one interview. Since school started I have toned back looking, but I've still applied for another 30 jobs," he said. "They're jobs where you figure they're always looking for people. I'm overqualified for all of those. I have retail experience."
Nationally, the unemployment rate for people ages 16 to 24 climbed to 19.1 percent in July, up from 10.8 percent in July 2007.
For those from ages 16 to 19, the situation is even worse, with unemployment at 24.6 percent in November. Still, that was down from 27.1 percent in October and 26.8 percent in November 2009, and it was the first time the rate was below 25 percent since July 2009. In Colorado, the teen unemployment rate was 24.7 percent in 2009, slightly above the national rate.
"My sense is that it's getting stronger, that there are more jobs out there and a better job outlook for these kids who are looking for work," said Ginger Hecht, who develops job programs for young people up to 21 years old for the city of Denver. Still, she said, it remains an extremely difficult environment for young job seekers.
The city's summer employment program helped 567 youths find work this summer, but more than 1,000 applied, Hecht said.
Daniel Cano, 16, of Denver recently landed a paid, part-time internship with an advertising agency with help from Goodwill Industries, which works with the city on its teen job-placement programs.
The junior at West High School considers himself fortunate, since the fast-food chains he applied with didn't hire him.
"It's tough," he said. "Most of my friends can't find anything."
Ebony Wake, 21, of Denver found a job recently at Wal-Mart after just a few weeks of looking.
"They are hiring part time due to the holidays," she said.
The jobs shortage comes as government programs to place youths with employers are cut back. The city has launched a Bridges to Work program that placed 28 youths with local employers this year through private sponsorships. The city hopes to add more employers this year.
There are other routes teens can take to gain employment experience. The Boys & Girls Clubs of Metro Denver employs 75 to 100 teens as junior staff members at its clubs throughout the metro area.
"The kids at that age are absolutely desperate for any kind of money so they can buy some clothes and other things for themselves, and even for their families," said John Arigoni, president and chief executive. "The problem is greater for low-income, poor kids."
Greg Griffin: 303-954-1241 or ggriffin@denverpost.com

description.hltext_display: Global Solutions from Kaplan - Analyst Blog
description.content:
With a view to enhancing its educational reach, Kaplan Inc., a subsidiary of The Washington Post Company (WPO">WPO), recently formed Kaplan Global Solutions for the Americas, which jointly with colleges and universities will provide education services and products through programs such as Global Pathways, the US-Sino Pathway Program, @Kaplan Asia and Colloquy.
Initially, Kaplan Global Solutions will provide a range of online learning tools, curriculum research and design services, and technology based educational platforms to assist colleges and universities to enhance the enrollment of students worldwide, and build up novel education programs to woo perpetual learners.
Kaplan Global Solutions, which is part of the Kaplan Ventures division, also has units in Europe and Asia-Pacific. Anne K. Keehn has been named as the President of Kaplan Global Solutions of the Americas.
Earlier, in a separate story, The Washington Post Company announced plans to shed approximately 770 employees or 5% of its workforce at its Kaplan Higher Education division, citing declining enrollments.
Total Kaplan Higher Education enrollments jumped 8% as of September 30, 2010 but slowed from 28% attained in the prior-year.
Kaplan Higher Education recently slashed 130 jobs in South Florida, as a part of its total employee reduction. The division, which is under review for possible prevarication about their financial aid, recruitment procedure and accreditation, defended itself by informing that the work-force reduction does not relate to any pending lawsuit.
The division notified that it will now be more selective while enrolling students, who would be required to undergo meticulous academic evaluation and meet their financial commitments.
The sector bellwether Apollo Group Inc. (APOL">APOL) also recently laid off 700 full-time employees due to lower fall in enrollments.
The current potential risk looming over the education sector is the regulation proposed by the Department of Education that may weigh upon students’ enrollments and the company’s profits.
Recently, the Department of Education proposed that an educational program could only qualify for Title IV funds, if it helps in achieving gainful employment, which includes the criteria of loan repayment rate and debt-to-income ratios. The institutions are under the scanner due to the rise in the default rate of student loans, and are now being asked to submit information relating to recruitment procedures and the use of student’s grant.
Currently, we have a Neutral rating on The Washington Post Company.

description.hltext_display: Coreia do Sul inicia nova série de exercícios militares
description.content:
SEUL, 22 dez 2010 (AFP) -A Coreia do Sul anunciou nesta quarta-feira uma nova série de manobras militares, três dias depois de ter executado exercícios na ilha bombardeada por Pyongyang em novembro, ataque que deu início à tensão na península coreana.
O Exército anunciou manobras militares, terrestres e aéreas, com uso de munição real, para quinta-feira em uma área próxima da fronteira com a Coreia do Norte.
As manobras, classificadas de ''importantes'', acontecerão em Pocheon, 20 km ao sul da fronteira entre as Coreias, segundo o Exército.
Pocheon já foi cenário de vários exercícios militares.
As manobras terão a participação de 800 soldados, além de helicópteros, seis aviões de combate, tanques, mísseis antitanque e lança-foguetes.
O Exército também anunciou o início de manobras navais nesta quarta-feira na costa leste da península coreana, no Mar do Japão, em um exercício que deve durar quatro dias.
Os exercícios acontecem a quase 100 quilômetros da fronteira com a Coreia do Norte, com a presença de seis navios de guerra e helicópteros.
O objetivo das manobras é treinar as tropas para uma resposta em caso de invasão de submarinos ou navios de patrulha da Coreia do Norte em águas sul-coreanas.
"Os exercícios demonstrarão a solidez de nossa preparação militar", declarou o comandante do I Batalhão Armado, Choo Eun-Sik.
"Vamos executar represálias severas caso o Norte se aventure em outro ato de provocação como o bombardeio de Yeonpyeong", acrescentou.
Na segunda-feira, Seul realizou breves exercícios militares com munição real na ilha de Yeonpyeong, apesar das ameaças de graves represálias feitas por Pyongyang. Mas a Coreia do Norte decidiu não responder às manobras.
Em 23 de novembro, a Coreia do Norte bombardeou Yeonpyeong, no primeiro ataque a uma zona habitada por civis desde o fim da Guerra da Coreia (1953). Quatro sul-coreanos morreram, o que gerou uma onda de protestos ao redor do mundo.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Importe mit stärkstem Preisanstieg seit zehn Jahren
description.content:
Berlin (Reuters) - Teure Energie, Rohstoffe und Metalle haben die deutschen Importpreise im November so stark steigen lassen wie seit zehn Jahren nicht mehr.
Die Einfuhrpreise lagen um 10,0 Prozent über dem Niveau des Vorjahresmonats, teilte das Statistische Bundesamt am Mittwoch mit. Einen stärkeren Anstieg hatte es zuletzt im November 2000 mit 10,6 Prozent gegeben. Von Reuters befragte Analysten hatten lediglich ein Plus von 9,3 Prozent erwartet. Verglichen mit dem Vormonat zogen die Preise mit 1,2 Prozent mehr als doppelt so stark an wie erwartet.
Die Daten deuten darauf hin, dass die Verbraucherpreise in den kommenden Monaten wieder etwas stärker steigen werden, weil Unternehmen die höheren Einkaufskosten zumindest teilweise auf ihre Kunden abwälzen. Das Ifo-Institut rechnet in diesem Jahr mit einer durchschnittlichen Teuerungsrate von 1,1 Prozent, für 2011 werden 1,7 Prozent erwartet. Die Europäische Zentralbank (EZB) spricht bei Werten bis knapp unter zwei Prozent von stabilen Preise.
Energie kostete gut ein Viertel mehr als im November 2009. Erdgas verteuerte sich dabei mit 32,5 Prozent besonders stark. Für Kraftstoffe und andere Mineralölprodukte mussten 24,4 Prozent mehr bezahlt werden. Bei Rohstoffen wies Eisenerz den größten Sprung auf: Der Preis verdoppelte sich fast. Roheisen und Stahl verteuerten sich um 29,0 Prozent. Für Getreideimporte wurden 55,4 Prozent mehr verlangt.

description.hltext_display: UPD Broadband and Phone Services Downed by BT Failure in West End of London UK
description.content:
BT can confirm that water damage from an adjacent business has disrupted power supplies to an exchange in the west end of London. A number of customers in Central London are currently experiencing a loss of service.
Following clearance from the Fire Brigade, BT's engineers are on site and working around the clock to repair the damage and restore service as quickly as possible. BT would like to apologise to all customers impacted.
Given the complexity of the damage, it is not yet possible to accurately predict when all services will be fully restored. BT will issue further updates as the situation changes.

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.
The spokesman said: "On arrival, firefighters were bringing the two patients out of the smoke-filled house.
"As further crews were only seconds away, the first (crew to arrive) decided to leave the scene immediately with the child to take him to University Hospital in Coventry.
"While the crew worked on the child, a firefighter drove the ambulance."
Both victims were in cardiac arrest when they were rescued from the two-storey terrace house and fire crews also attempted to resuscitate the adult victim.
The ambulance service spokesman said the second crew to arrive immediately took over efforts to revive the man before taking him to the same hospital.
"Sadly, despite the best efforts of fire, ambulance and hospital staff, it was not possible to save either the man or the boy and they were both confirmed dead shortly after arrival at hospital," the spokesman said.

description.hltext_display: A touch of luxury for Austria
description.content:
Accor’s luxury Sofitel brand has re-entered the Austrian market this week with the opening of the 182-room Sofitel Vienna Stephansdom, in Vienna.
The 18-storey hotel, which was designed by French architect Jean Nouvel, has brought with it a bit of greenery to the Austrian capital in the form of landscape architect and botanist Patrick Blanc’s vertical garden, a living wall of 20,000 species of flora.
According to Accor’s website, the French company currently has 30 other hotels (4,190 rooms) in operation in Austria under its various brands.

description.hltext_display: Baggage handler found asleep in cargo
description.content:
Incorrect loading can be serious, here it has caused a plane to pitch up / ATSB Source: Supplied Weight and balance issues have been investigated by the ATSB / ATSB Source: Supplied Baggage handler slept in cargo hold Among 260 cargo loading incidents reported The incidents can have serious consquences AIRLINE staff were shocked to discover a baggage handler who had fallen asleep inside the plane's cargo hold after hearing a "loud thumping noise" while preparing to take-off, the Australian Transport Safety Bureau says. In another surprising incident, a dog escaped from the cargo door of a taxiing Boeing 737 and was seen running next to the plane.
The incidents were among 260 reported to the ATSB over the past seven years and detailed in a safety report focusing on loading issues. The majority of them - 98 per cent - involved passenger planes. While some are "minor" events, the ATSB outlined recent examples of loading occurrences that could have had disastrous implications.
Among the serious incidents was a Bulgarian-registered Airbus A320 that suffering a tail-strike during take-off from an Italian airport in 2009.
The cause was found to be due to the forward cargo hold being emptied of luggage at one stopover, while the rear hold remained packed with luggage, leaving the plane unbalanced.
The safety watchdog also detailed a serious incident in Australia where 60 additional golf bags weighing 1300kg were loaded onto a plane, resulting in unexpected handling issues.
The ATSB is investigating two other recent incidents - one involving a plane that was one tonne over its maximum take-off weight and another with about 700kg of unlisted cargo.
It says that while there have been a comparatively small number of such incidents, more care is needed. "Generally, there are a small number of loading occurrences per million movements, but there is no room for complacency," the ATSB said in the report.
Loading incidents in Australia have typically dealt with evidence of fire on cargo hold pallets, cargo restraint and locks, aircraft weight and balance, inadequate load documentation, cost-cutting, training and communication.
Fifty-five per cent of these incidents related to the securing of cargo, 30 per cent to incorrect loading, 10 per cent to loadsheet errors and five per cent to aircraft configuration.
The failure to raise cargo locks was identified as the most commonly reported occurrence. This is dangerous as it could lead to cargo moving around during the flight and impacting the planes centre of gravity and controllability.
Airline operators have improved their loading systems recently but cross-checking by crew is essential for safety, the ATSB said.

description.hltext_display: Hoch verschuldetes Spanien verabschiedet Haushalt 2011
description.content:
Madrid (Reuters) - Das spanische Parlament hat am Dienstag dem Hauhalt für das kommende Jahr zugestimmt.
Wirtschaftsministerin Elena Salgado sprach von einem wichtigen Instrument, um den Schritt von der Krise zum wirtschaftlichen Wachstum zu schaffen. Durch den Haushalt soll das Defizit des hoch verschuldeten Landes um mehr als drei Prozentpunkte gesenkt und die Finanzmärkte beruhigt werden. Spanien gilt als einer der Kandidaten für den EU-Rettungsschirm.
© Thomson Reuters 2010 Alle Rechte vorbehalten.

description.hltext_display: Zvěsti o znásilněních se šíří
description.content:
Jablonecko – Fáma o pachateli, který znásilňuje ženy a dívky, zneklidňuje občany Jablonecka. Podle policie tam ale žádný násilník neřádí.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) dnes 7:39
Ilustrační foto.
Autor: DENÍK
„Už nás kontaktovali z několika škol. Nejen z Jablonce, ale také z Tanvaldu nebo Smržovky. Chtěli vědět, jestli v okrese skutečně řádí pachatel, který znásilňuje ženy a dívky,“ řekla Deníku mluvčí jablonecké policie Ludmila Knopová s tím, že jde o fámu, která se po Jablonecku šíří už zhruba půl roku.
Ale zbytečný strach narůstá. Lidé už se začali ptát i u nás v redakci. „Nechápu, že nás nikdo neupozorní, ať si dáváme pozor. Bojím se,“ zaznělo v jednom z e–mailů.
Na řadě škol podle našeho zjištění dokonce varovali žákyně před hrozbou napadení. „Také se to k nám doneslo a ve třídách jsme se zmiňovali, aby si děti dávaly pozor,“ konstatovala ředitelka jablonecké Základní školy 5. května Michaela Hanyšová.
Podle jablonecké policejní mluvčí sice neškodí, když se děti upozorní na případné hrozby a budou si dávat pozor, ale případné vyvolávání paniky je neopodstatněné.
„Opravdu tady žádný násilník neřádí. Tahle fáma podle mého vznikla poté, co se před půl rokem podařilo odhalit pachatele tří znásilnění, k nimž došlo na různých místech Jablonecka. Po okrese se o tom tehdy začalo mluvit a rychle se rozšířila historka o tom, že někdo na Jablonecku přepadává ženy,“ uvedla Ludmila Knopová.
Zatímco loni došlo v okrese ke třem znásilněním, letos jich bylo už deset, z toho sedm případů policisté objasnili. Výjimkou nejsou případy vymyšlených znásilnění.

description.hltext_display: Prep Basketball: West Rowan girls 75, Statesville 25
description.content:
STATESVILLE —The West Rowan girls basketball team used a balanced attack early and often Tuesday night as it smashed Statesville 75-24.
Coach Erich Epps was able to get significant minutes to everyone on his team with the exception of guard Brooke Harrington who was the victim of a concussion early in the contest.
“We knew that Statesville was down this year and we wanted to mix and match some lineups and get all of the girls in the game as much as we could,” said Epps.
West began the game with a fullcourt press and the quickness of Ayana Avery and the length of Shay Steele wreaked havoc all night for the Lady Falcons as they accumulated 28 steals in the game.
“This win was really big for us as we are 2-1 in the conference and our girls needed this after the loss to Carson, which was tough,” Epps said. “But I’m really proud of our effort on defense.”
West Rowan was led by Avery’s 21 points, 12 of which came from behind the arc, and Steele’s 19. Freshman point guard Nycieko Dixon added 15 points and five steals.
A funny moment occured late in the game when West Rowan guard Brittany Barber threw up a Harlem Globetrotter-like shot over her head and swished it. I[0x13]t was that kind of night for the Falcons.
Statesville just could never muster up much of an offense against the more talented Falcons but fought and scrapped hard all night for rebounds and loose balls.
“I told my girls that I was proud of the heart they showed even in the loss,” Statesville coach Todd Jones said. “We didnt want to play against East Rowan the other night and that was disappointing but tonight they were much more focused.”
Cameron Bradley led Statesville with eight points while Courtney McCord added six.
“West Rowan is a very good team and we knew that coming in. We just threw dumb and bad passes and against a team as long and skilled as they are. You cannot afford to do that,” said Jones.
WEST ROWAN (75) — Avery 21, Steele 19, Dixon 15, Barber 9, Sobotaka 4, Caldwell 3, Ball 2, Miller 2, Dutton, Harrington, Watson.
STATESVILLE (24) —C Bradley 8, McCord 6, B Bradley 5, Wudecki 3, Witt 2, Crosswhite, Eller, Wilkens.

description.hltext_display: Roundup: WHS girls beat Athens
description.content:
Rachel Fatherly and Aisha Evans combined for 30 points to lead Williamsport to a 47-45 win over Athens Tuesday night in girls basketball.
In boys basketball, Emmitt Watson scored 22 points as Canton beat Elkland, 54-45.
Doug Zehner scored 26 points as Muncy pulled away from St. John Neumann in the fourth quarter, 72-62.
Mount Carmel turned a 4-point halftime lead into a 54-36 win over Warrior Run.
Dalton Molyneux scored 10 points with 10 rebounds as Sullivan County beat Benton, 53-23.
Shikellamy outscored Jersey Shore by 14 points in the fourth quarter to win, 53-36.
Bloomsburg had four double-digit scorers in a 73-42 win over South Williamsport
Mitch Hock scored 14 points for Central Columbia in a 46-25 win over Montoursville.
Muncy scored five pins to go along with four wins by forfeit in a 54-27 win over South Williamsport.
Canton had seven pins and two major decisions in a 58-21 win over Williamson.
Montoursville had four pins in a 54-24 win over Mount Carmel.
Towanda won all but one bout in a 68-6 win over North Penn.
Midd-West beat Williamsport on criteria of most bouts won, 7-6, in a 36-36 match.
Troy had five pins and won by decision five times in a 45-18 win over Sullivan County.
Garrett Hauck was nearly pinned in the second period at 135 but battled off his back and pinned Tim Laubscher in 5:37 as Milton beat Selinsgrove, 47-25.
In boys swimming, Matt Runtas and Trevor Harris each won two individual events en route to a 102-69 win over Bloomsburg. Bloomsburg's Zach Stevens set a pool record with a time of 1:55.06 in the Individual Medley.
Bethann Schwoyer scored wins in the 200-yard freestyle and the 100-yard back to lead Williamsport's girls swim team to a 95-85 win over Bloomsburg.
In women's basketball, Penn State fell 82-73 to Drexel in a meeting of the two top 3-point shooting teams in the country. Drexel shot 50 percent on 3s, while PSU?was 6-for-19.
Bucknell fell 80-75 at Wofford to enter the holiday break at 2-7 despite Shelby Romine notching career highs with 23 points, 6 assists, and 6 rebounds.

description.hltext_display: PDP Begins Screening of Guber Aspirants in S-West
description.content:
The screening of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, governorship aspirants in the South-West kicked off Tuesday in Abeokuta with aspirants arriving for the exercise being conducted by the Committee headed by Senator Florence Ita-Giwa.
Only aspirants from Ogun, Lagos and Oyo States are expected at the screening as governorship elections would hold only in those states having lost Ondo, Ekiti, and Osun States to opposition parties at the law courts.
Incidentally, only the incumbent governor of Oyo State, Otunba Adebayo Alao-Akala, is seeking a second term in the region.
He was already through with the screening by 5.30 pm, coming out of the venue of the event beaming with smile and telling his supporters of the provisional approval granted him after fulfilling the requirements.
Governor Alao-Akala was given preference to quickly appear after he came as a sitting Governor. After his screening, he immidiately left the venue back to Ibadan.
Lagos was the first to be screened and three aspirants had already received their Provisional Clearance Cerificate before Governor Alao-Akala was called in.
Also given preference was Senator Kola Bajomo as a sitting Senator. He was before the Committee at the time of filling the report.
Aspirants who arrived early for the screening scheduled to commence at 1.00 pm at the Presidential Lodge were mostly from Ogun and Lagos states and were each given forms for their documentation which required photocopies of tax clearance certificate and a host of other things. They were, however, closely followed by aspirants from Oyo State.
Chairman of the screening committee, Senator Ita-Giwa said the exercise would take two days and that seven aspirants were expected from Lagos, four from Oyo and 18 from Ogun State, adding that her committee would adhere strictly to the time allotted by the guidelines of the party.
The committee, she said, would not witch-hunt any aspirant, adding that they were only to ensure that their documentations were proper and verified and to make sure that none of them had been in jail.
She said after the exercise those found worthy would be given Provisional Clearance Certificate.
Aspirants who arrived early for the exercise from Ogun include, Chief Leye Odunjo, Alhaji Gboyega Nasir Isiaka, Senator Kola Bajomo, Chief Jide Taiwo, Mr. Kola Lawal, Gen Adetunji Olurin (rtd), Commander Rasheed Raji (rtd), Dr. Femi Majekodunmi, Rev. Jide Awosedo, Mrs. Kafilat Ogbara, Mrs. Titi Ajanaku, and Chief Bashiru Akinyemi.
From Lagos were Engr. Olatokunbo Kamson, Chief Femi Pedro, Chief Ade Dosumu, Chief Demola Seriki and Chief Babajide Olalere Gbadamosi
Contenders from Oyo State include, one-time deputy to Governor Alao-Akala, Alhaji Azeem Gbolarumi, Alhaji Yekini Adeojo and Elder Wole Oyelese.

description.hltext_display: Děti nezajímá čistý lustr, ale vysněný dárek
description.content:
Olomouc – Ještě umýt okna, sehnat kapří hlavu a mlíčí na štědrovečerní polévku, dozdobit cukroví. Poslední dny před Vánocemi propadají dospělí stresu. Těm nejmenším, pro které Vánoce hlavně dělají, je ale úplně jedno, jestli lustr, pod nímž si hrají, je vyleštěný nebo ne. Podle olomoucké dětské psycholožky Lenky Nejeschlebové děti nejvíce ocení pohodovou atmosféru v rodině a hlavně: pod stromečkem vysněný dárek.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) dnes 7:45
Ilustrační foto
Autor: Pavlína Mitrengová
„Je potřeba se zastavit a uvědomit si, co znamená advent a že Vánoce jsou jeho vyvrcholením. Dítě nejvíce ocení, když s ním budeme prožívat chvíle těšení a navozovat je. Můžeme si s nimi povídat a číst o adventu a sami se u toho zklidnit,“ doporučovala psycholožka, která rozumí duši těch nejmenších. „Dospělí jsou pod velkým tlakem a je těžké jej ustát. Měli bychom se však dokázat zastavit. Sami cítíme, co s námi stres dělá, a přenášíme to i na dítě,“ dodala.
Doma klidně stačí polovina druhů vánočního cukroví. Zaprášená okna? Stejně nejsou skoro vidět, protože je brzy tma. „Děti ocení, když s nimi upečeme pár druhů, necháme je ušoulat rohlíčky, i když nebudou tak dokonalé jako ty naše, než je ve stresu odhánět, ať nepřekáží,“ poznamenala Nejeschlebová.
Stres a případné hádky dospělých kvůli předvánočnímu shonu jsou zbytečné. „Je dobré si uvědomit, že to za čím se ženeme jsou vlastně jen tři dny. Užijme si adventu, ať vysílení a vyčerpaní nepadneme pod stromeček, a máme chuť a sílu prožívat radost svých dětí,“ dodala.
Čtěte také: Odborníci radí, jak přežít vánoční stres

description.content: 汤唯在代言活动现场汤唯亮装出席代言坦言要踏实做好每件事12月21日，汤唯现身北京出席某代言活动，身着红色斜肩连身裙的她,尽显优雅姿态。汤唯的星途可谓是几经周折,今年演艺事业重新起步,先后接拍主旋律大片《建党伟业》、陈可辛武侠大片《武侠》、以及马楚成新片《极速天使》等，可算是解封后又重见天日，而问到汤唯对今

description.hltext_display: Top Stories Of 2010: No. 4
description.content:
#example-one a img, #example-one a } #example-one a:hover } #example-one a:hover img } Marijuana Wars While California debated legalizing and taxing marijuana in 2010, Central Coast cities were busy snuffing out medical marijuana dispensaries.
Nearly a dozen cities in the region put bans or moratoriums on medical marijuana dispensaries.
In Monterey, the city sued a medical marijuana dispensary that opened on Lighthouse Avenue, saying the nature of the business was not disclosed to city officials and that the operation violated zoning laws.
Gilroy's fight with MediLeaf, which opened in 2009 without a business license, continued to play out in 2010. In August of this year, MediLeaf was forced to close in Gilroy after a judge upheld the city's claim that the clinic was operating illegally.
In December, authorities raided MediLeaf clinics in Santa Clara County after an eight-month investigation. Authorities said they were able to establish probable cause that illegal marijuana sales and money laundering took place at eight MediLeaf stores.
Meanwhile, Prop. 19 -- the measure that would legalize and tax marijuana in California -- was rejected by voters in November's election. Previous Stories: December 10, 2010: September 29, 2010: August 9, 2010: July 27, 2010:

description.hltext_display: Video usnadní ženám porod
description.content:
Brno – Porod bývá pro budoucí matky velmi stresující. Hlavně pro prvorodičky. „Hodně jsem se bála. Všichni v okolí mě strašili, takže jsem jela do porodnice s hrůzou. I když to nebyl příjemný zážitek, personál mi velmi pomohl, takže se to dalo vydržet,“ vzpomíná na porod dcery Lenka Procházková, která rodila v brněnské fakultní nemocnici.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) dnes 8:23
Ilustrační foto
Autor: schutterstock.com
Podle odborníků se ženy bojí přehnaně. Specialisté z gynekologicko–porodnické kliniky Fakultní nemocnice Brno proto připravili krátký film, který rodičkám ukáže, jak to bude u porodu vypadat. „Je dokázané, že pokud rodička ví, do čeho jde, má menší strach a narození potomka ji méně bolí,“ uvedl primář gynekologicko – porodnické kliniky Fakultní nemocnice Brno Petr Janků.
Video budoucím matkám odpoví na nejčastější otázky, které ženy před porodem mají. „Nejvíce je zajímá jestli může být u porodu partner a jak samotný porod vypadá. Ptají se také na to, zda je nutný klystýr a co bude s dítětem po narození,“ doplnil primář.
Instruktážní film je podle něj jakýmsi vyvrcholením jejich práce s budoucími matkami. „Máme internetovou poradnu, kde odpovídáme na nejčastější dotazy maminek. Pořádáme pravidelně přednášky o porodu a také prohlídku oddělení a porodních sálů,“ vyjmenoval Janků.
Film, který natočil fotograf Zbyněk Maděrič, bude v nejbližších dnech volně dostupný na internetu. „Chceme, aby k němu měly přístup všechny budoucí maminky. Doufám, že jim pomůže,“ řekl Janků.
Přečtěte si také: Jitka Slivečková: Strach z vody může trvat celý život

description.hltext_display: Facebook CEO meets with Sina during China holiday
description.content:
BEIJING, (AFP) - Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg -- on holiday in China where his social networking site is officially blocked -- met Wednesday with top executives from the country's popular web portal Sina.com.
Zuckerberg's meeting with Sina.com chief executive Charles Chao and vice president Peng Shaobin comes two days after the 26-year-old had lunch with the head of search engine giant Baidu to discuss the world's biggest web market.
"Mr Zuckerberg came to get a better understanding of Sina and China’s Weibo market," Sina said in a statement sent to AFP.
"It’s more of a casual than a formal visit."
Sina's Weibo is a Twitter-like microblogging service. Foreign social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter are blocked by China's government but many users on the mainland access them via virtual proxy networks.
Beijing has set up a huge online censorship system sometimes dubbed the "Great Firewall of China" that aggressively blocks sites or snuffs out Internet content on topics considered sensitive.
Zuckerberg, clearly keen to see his company crack the Chinese market of at least 420 million Internet users, told an audience at Stanford University recently that he was "spending a lot of time" studying Chinese.
"It's kind of a personal challenge this year, I'm taking an hour a day and I'm learning Chinese. I'm trying to understand the language, the culture, the mindset -- it's just such an important part of the world," he said.
"How can you connect the whole world if you leave out a billion-six people?"
Zuckerberg, who is on holiday with his Chinese-American girlfriend, met with Baidu's chief executive Robin Li on Monday, a spokesman for the Chinese company, Kaiser Kuo, told AFP.
"It makes sense -- he is interested in the Chinese Internet, he's made that very plain. Obviously this is one of the big dark spots for Facebook because it is blocked here in China," Kuo said.
"He has had a long-standing interest in China. I'm sure he wants to get the advice of someone who knows the Internet landscape well here."
Facebook told AFP ahead of the trip that the 26-year-old -- recently named Time's "Person of the Year" -- was "not doing any press or any meetings" during his vacation in China.

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a boy have died after a house fire in the West Midlands
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: Idaho 69, Oregon 65: Vandals slip away as Ducks can't find the basket
description.author: Special to The Oregonian
description.content:
EUGENE -- Oregon has eight days to prepare for its Pacific-10 Conference opener. If Tuesday's 69-65 loss to Idaho is an indication, the Ducks will have to make every day count.
The Vandals (6-5) outplayed Oregon during the final 10 minutes at McArthur Court to beat the Ducks, who head into Pac-10 play with a two-game losing streak.
One statistic stood out above all others for Oregon. The Ducks (7-5) shot a miserable 33.8 percent (23 of 68) from the floor. Oregon shot 32 percent in the first half, 36 percent after halftime. The Ducks were 16 of 39 on two-point shots, and 7 of 29 from three-point range.
Of Oregon's nine players to attempt a shot, only Joevan Catron shot at least 50 percent (6 of 12). Catron led the Ducks with 18 points, 14 during the second half.
"We've got to do a better job of finishing plays and making shots," Ducks coach Dana Altman said.
Idaho mixed man and zone defenses against the Ducks, and Vandals coach Don Verlin said the change-ups "did a nice job of disrupting their rhythm. We made their shooters take one step back farther than they wanted to."
The Vandals didn't have such shooting problems. Idaho shot 61 percent during the first half and finished 23 of 47 from the field (49 percent). Forward Brandon Wiley led the way with 14 points, six rebounds and five blocked shots.
"That's as good as this basketball team can play," Verlin said.
Oregon bounced back from a 40-35 halftime deficit, as Malcolm Armstead hit two three-pointers early in the second half to get the Ducks going. Oregon gained its only lead of the second half at 55-54 on a 10-foot jumper by Jeremy Jacob.
But Idaho immediately scored eight unanswered points to take a 62-55 lead, then held off the sour-shooting Ducks during the final minutes.
Idaho freshman Stephen Madison, who played for Oregon Class 5A champion Jefferson last year, scored a season-high eight points in 10 minutes of action.
The Ducks open Pac-10 play Dec. 30 at home against Arizona.

event_or_fact.property: That's as good as this basketball team can play
We've got to do a better job of finishing plays and making shots

description.hltext_display: Another mega mixed-use development for Singapore
description.content:
Source : HVS International
GuocoLand is planning to build a US$2.3 billion mixed-use development on top of the Tanjong Pagar MRT Station.
As stipulated by the Urban Redevelopment Authority, GuocoLand is required to allocate at least 60% of the maximum 1.7 million square feet gross floor area to offices and another 10% for hotels.
The project will also feature the tallest residential tower in the country, which will reach 78 storeys. The group plans to develop two towers with offices, a hotel, apartments and ground-floor retail space.

description.hltext_display: BRENNSTOFFSPIEGEL: Rohöl so teuer wie seit 2008 nicht mehr
description.author: brennstoffspiegel
description.content: LEIPZIG. (Ceto) Die Rohölnotierungen kannten auch gestern nur eine Marschrichtung – nach oben. Dabei erreichten sie mit 93,50 US-Dollar für Nordseeöl (Brent) und 90,00 Dollar für US-Leichtöl (WTI) nicht nur neue Jahreshöchststände. Rohöl ist damit so teuer wie seit dem 1. Oktober 2008 nicht mehr. Die Preise wurden im heutigen Morgenhandel komplett behauptet. Den Ausschlag für den erneuten Anstieg gaben gestern die Daten des American Petroleum Institute. Die ölindustrienahe Institution konstatierte für die vergangene Woche nicht nur einen deutlichen Abbau bei Rohöl (-5,8 Millionen Barrel), sondern auch bei Benzin (- 2,9 Millionen Barrel), was auf die verbesserte Wirtschaftslage in den Staaten hinweist. Lediglich bei den Mitteldestillaten gab es minimale Aufbauten (16.000 Barrel). Für eine weitere, wenn auch nur leichte Verknappung dürfte zudem die Explosion einer Pipeline in Mexiko sorgen. Wie schon die ganze Woche über müssen Verbraucher in Deutschland am nunmehr 5. Tag in Folge mit Aufschlägen rechnen. Dazu trägt auch ein weiterhin schwacher Euro, der heute Morgen für wenig mehr als 1,31 US-Dollar gehandelt wurde, bei. Das berichtet das Onlineportal des Fachmagazins BRENNSTOFFSPIEGEL und mineralölrundschau auf seiner Website http://www.brennstoffspiegel.de . Eine tagtägliche Einschätzung der Entwicklung der Rohöl- und Heizölpreise sowie wichtige Meldungen zum Energiemarkt bietet der Ceto-Newsticker. Interessenten, die diesen auf ihrer Website einbinden möchten, finden dazu hier weitere Informationen: http://www.brennstoffspiegel.de/cet....ionen_ceto_newsticker.pdf . Eine regelmäßige Übersicht über die Entwicklung des Heizölpreises findet sich auch im kostenfreien Newsletter „Energie & Mittelstand“, der zweimal im Monat von BRENNSTOFFSPIEGEL und mineralölrundschau herausgegeben wird. Die Registrierung dafür erfolgt einfach und schnell unter http://www.brennstoffspiegel.de/frame.php?module=add_newsletter .

description.hltext_display: Bojan Senang Kontrak Diperpanjang
description.author: Taufik Bagus
description.content:
Bojan Krkic menegaskan kini bisa lebih berkonsentrasi pada performanya setelah masa depan karirnya bersama Barcelona tuntas terjawab.
Oleh Taufik Bagus
Share Share
Bojan Krkic, Barcelona, Cultural Leonesa (MARCA)
Bojan Krkic dipastikan bertahan di Nou Camp hingga Juni 2015 setelah memperpanjang kontraknya bersama Barcelona kemarin.
Selain gaji yang mengalami perubahan, buy-out clause Bojan juga meningkat signifikan dari 80 juta euro menjadi 100 juta euro.
Kesepakatan itu pun disambut baik Bojan. Ia menegaskan kini bisa lebih total membela Barcelona tanpa ada keraguan mengenai masa depannya.
"Saya pun kini bisa terus mengembangkan kehidupan saya di klub yang menjadi dambaan saya," katanya, Rabu (22/12).
"Yang terpenting saat ini adalah apa yang terjadi di lapangan, tapi dengan fakta pihak klub sudah memberikan saya kontrak jangka panjang, hal itu menunjukkan mereka percaya dengan saya. Tantangannya saat ini adalah menunjukkan apa yang saya bisa," papar Bojan.
>> Halaman Khusus Sepakbola Spanyol
>> Jadwal - Hasil - Klasemen Primera Liga Spanyol

description.hltext_display: CarMax Surpasses Zacks Estimates - Analyst Blog
description.content:
CarMax Inc. (KMX) posted a profit of $82.4 million or 36 cents per share in the third quarter of its fiscal 2011, barely surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of 34 cents per share. The profit was higher than $74.6 million or 33 cents per share in the prior-year quarter.
CarMax’s results were positively driven by a rebound in customer traffic and sales execution along with a favorable year-over-year comparison. This is also reflected by 16% improvement in comparable store sales for the quarter. Net sales and operating revenues in the quarter went up 23% to $2.12 billion, higher than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.97 billion.
Used vehicle sales escalated 20% to $1.69 billion. This can be attributable to continued rebound in customer traffic and an improvement in sales conversion, reflecting better availability of consumer credit.
However, new vehicle sales rose 24.9% to $47.7 million. Wholesale vehicle sales appreciated 41.1% to $320.1 million, driven by increase in appraisal traffic as well as appraisal buy rate.
Other sales and revenues increased by 16.8% to $62.9 million, driven mainly by increases in extended service plan (ESP) revenues.The 31% increase in ESP revenues reflected both the growth in used unit sales and better penetration of ESP.
Gross profit was $297.9 million in the quarter, up 23% from $242.9 million driven by increases in used and wholesale unit sales as well as an improvement in ESP revenues.
Selling, general and administrative were $219.7 million in the quarter compared with $192.1 million in second quarter of fiscal 2010. The 14% increased was attributable to increases in sales commissions and other variable costs associated with the growth in unit sales and higher advertising expense.
CarMax Auto Finance (CAF)
CAF reported a decline in income to $55.7 million from $65.8 million in the quarter. The lower income was attributable to adjustments of $31.6 million related to loans that originated in the third quarter of previous fiscal year.
Financial Position
CarMax had cash and cash equivalent of $74.4 million as of November 30, 2010, which was significantly higher than $15.2 million in the same period a year ago. Long-term debt reduced significantly to $29.3 million as of the above date from $149.7 million as of November 30, 2009.
In the first nine months of fiscal 2011, CarMax had a cash outflow of $22.5 million compared with an inflow of $56.5 million in the same period of prior year. The decline in cash flow was mainly attributable to increases in inventory and auto loans receivables. Meanwhile, capital expenditures increased to $38.5 million from $18.4 million in the first nine months of fiscal 2010.
Our Take
We appreciate CarMax’s focus on the used-car market, which helps it to outperform the industry. The automotive retailer is among the strongest operators in its peer group, which includes AutoNation Inc. (AN) and Penske Automotive Group (PAG).
In the first quarter of fiscal 2011, CarMax resumed its strategy to open new used-car superstores, driven by improved economic and sales environment in the U.S. Under the strategy, the company plans to open used car superstores at an annual rate of 15%–20%. The company plans to open five stores in 2012; and five to ten stores in 2013.
These, along with the improved results, have led the company to retain Zacks #2 Rank on its stock, which translated to a short-term (1–3 months) recommendation of Buy.

description.hltext_display: Vyplavené domy mrznou, vysoušet lze ale i v zimě
description.content:
Domy poznamenané povodní trpí dál. Mrazem.
Autor: Deník/Petr Šimr
Srpen letošního roku byl pro Liberecký kraj měsícem hrůzy. Ničivá povodeň vzala, co mohla, včetně lidských životů, a ani čtyři měsíce poté nedává lidem spát. Vytopené domy je totiž těžké vysušit tak, aby voda ve zdech s příchodem prvního mrazu neponičila zdivo ještě víc. Během listopadu měli mnozí více starostí se zajištěním vlastní existence než s vysoušením domů.
„Máme strach, co se teď bude dít,“ říká rodina Zátkových z Bílého Kostela. „Náš dům je sice bytelný, stavěný ještě Němci, a povodeň už přežil, ale problémem jsou nové izolace.“ Právě za ně totiž natekla voda, která teď nemá kudy odtéct a hrozí dům rozervat. „Částečně ho ale máme vysušený, takže zbývá doufat a čekat,“ dodala rodina.
Podle starosty Bílého Kostela Jiřího Formánka je v obci dosud nevysušených domů více. „Vždyť jsme měli skoro všechny domy pod vodou,“ řekl. „Někteří je stihli vysušit ještě před úderem mrazů, někteří v nich teď více topí, aby voda ve zdech nezmrzla. Jestli ale někde zdi praskají, to teď nezjistíme. Musíme počkat do jara,“ doplnil.
Statik: vysoušet se dá i v zimě
„Pokud dojde k zamrzání vlhkosti ve zdech, může to stěnu poškodit, přetrhat vedení nebo zničit omítku,“ řekl statik Martin Pražan. „Že by ale zamrzlá voda dům zničila, to se může stát jen u neobývaných domů, kde nikdo netopí,“ dodal. Domy totiž lze vysoušet běžnými sušičkami i v zimě, i když jen zevnitř. Pomáhá i udržovat stěny v teple. Žádná zeď by neměla mít teplotu pod nulou.
„Nejohroženější jsou domy z porézních materiálů, třeba cihlové, stavěné za minulého režimu, a domy se smíšeným zdivem, kde použili hodně malty. Padat můžou některé klenby,“ dodal Martin Pražan. Naopak domy betonové nebo postavené z kvalitních materiálů můžou i vícenásobné vytopení přežít téměř bez úhony. Zkáza ovšem nastane až na jaře, kdy led ve zdech začne tát. Během zimy totiž ještě drží zdi pohromadě.
Není třeba se obávat o dřevěné prvky, protože dřevo více pruží a promrznutí snáší lépe.

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.

description.hltext_display: John Watson: Ghosts of gadgets past
description.content:
Back in 1877, Thomas Edison invented the phonograph, the first device for recording and playing back sound. The first recordings were on wax cylinders four inches long and two inches in diameter. The next recording medium was the 78 rpm record followed by the 45, each having one song on each side. These were followed by the 33 1/3 LP albums which had five or six songs on each side.
Perhaps you have seen pictures of Nipper, the dog, sitting by the speaker of a wind-up gramophone, with one ear perked up, listening. Underneath was the caption, “His Master’s Voice.” This picture was used by Victor Recording Company in all their advertising and on their record labels.
The first phonograph I remember my family having was spring-operated. You wound it up with a handle on the side, put the record on the turntable and released the turntable brake. This one only played the 78 rpm records.
The vinyl records were followed by the 8-track tape, which some of you may remember, then came the cassette tape. Now everyone has the music CD.
The radio was next on the scene. In 1895, Guglielmo Marconi, an Italian inventor, proved the feasibility of radio communication by sending and receiving his first radio signal. By the 1920s radio was just making its way into our area.
WBAP was one of the first stations to go on the air in this area. They started with only 10 watts of power in May 1922, and today are broadcasting with 50,000 watts of power, one of a few 50,000 watt clear-channel stations in the U.S.
During the early days they featured many local musicians performing live from their studio; these included “The Light Crust Doughboys,” “The Sunshine Boys,” “Bewley’s Chuck Wagon Gang” and many others.
Music was not the only thing we got from the radio; how about the soap operas? Some that I remember mother listening to back in the 1940’s were “Back Stage Wife,” “Young Widow Brown” and “One Man’s Family.”
Some of the shows I listened to were “The Lone Ranger,” “The Green Hornet,” “Amos ‘n Andy, “The Great Gildersleeve” and “Our Miss Brooks.” On Saturday mornings there was always Archie Andrews with his pals Jughead, Betty and Veronica. Another Saturday program I liked was Space Cadet.
My dad’s favorite program was Lum ’n Abner and the Jot-em Down Store. My granddad always listened to The FBI in War and Peace.
For many years all we had was the AM stations. George Marti started radio station KCLE AM sometime around 1947. It was what was known at that time as a daylight station, coming on at sun-up and going off the air at sunset. Sometime around 1950 he started KCLE FM, which carried the same programming as KCLE AM during the day but stayed on in the evenings until about 11 p.m.
This being the first FM station in the area, very few people had FM radios. In order to get more people interested in FM radios, Marti started doing a live remote broadcast of the Cleburne Yellow Jacket football games on Friday nights. Dad got our first FM radio in 1951 or ’52. At that time there were only three stations on the FM dial and one was so far away it did not come in very clear.
Our next entertainment venue was television. The first crude televisions were made in the 1920s. It was the 1940s before we had any TV stations in this area and then we only had three. These were channels 4, 5 and 8. As with the early radio stations, the TV stations were owned by the newspapers.
Channel 4, KRLD, was a CBS affiliate was an offshoot of KRLD Radio, also a CBS affiliate, and both were owned by the Dallas Times-Herald. Channel 5, WBAP, was an NBC affiliate and an offshoot of WBAP Radio, also an NBC affiliate, and both were owned by the Fort Worth Star-Telegram. Channel 8, WFAA, was an ABC affiliate and an offshoot of WFAA Radio, also an ABC affiliate, and both owned by the Dallas Morning News.
In the mid 1950s, KFJZ Radio started Channel 11, an independent station. At this time there were only 13 channels on the TV dial, all VHF channels. When the industry began to develop the UHF channels, the TVs came out with two channel selector dials; the first with the original 13 VHF channels plus a space labeled UHF. To get the higher channels you would set the first dial on UHF and use the second dial to select the channel you wanted to watch. There was no such thing as a remote control.
The first TV I ever saw was about 1950. Our neighbor, Ed Hutto, had gotten one which had a 10-inch round screen. It being something new, all the neighbors had to stop by and watch it a while. The first color TV I saw was in 1955 at the State Fair in Dallas. We got our first TV in 1957, a black and white portable set.
When the networks started broadcasting the shows in color they only had a few each day. Each time they started to broadcast a show in color, they would announce, “The following program is being brought to you in living color.”
Only the people who had purchased a new “color” TV could watch the shows in color. The color TVs were more expensive and not everyone wanted to pay the extra price just to see maybe four or five color shows a day. The other TVs still showed everything in black and white.
Many of the old radio shows transferred over to television. Some of these were “The Lone Ranger,” “Our Miss Brooks,” “Amos ’n Andy,” along with others.
Many of the early TVs were in large, free-standing cabinets which became another piece of furniture. Others were table models; however, they were all heavy due to the size of the glass picture tube.
Today with cable and satellite we have a choice of more than 100 channels to watch and the flat-screen TVs come in many different sizes up to a 50-inch wall mounted model.
I just wonder what changes the next 100 years will bring.
John Watson is a Cleburne resident who can be reached at texastraveler@sbcglobal.net.

description.hltext_display: College Football: Louisville 31, Southern Miss 28
description.content:
St. PETERBURG, Fla. —Justin Burke threw for a pair touchdowns and Jeremy Wright scored on a 95-yard kickoff return Tuesday night to help Louisville beat former Conference USA rival Southern Mississippi 31-28 in the Beef ‘O’ Brady’s Bowl.
Burke tossed scoring passes to 11 yards to Cameron Graham and 10 yards to Josh Chichester while the Cardinals (7-6) erased a 14-point first-half deficit, then produced a go-ahead field goal in the fourth quarter.
Austin Davis threw 205 yards and two touchdowns to become Southern Mississippi’s career TD pass leader, moving ahead of Brett Favre and Lee Roberts in the Golden Eagles record book with 53 in three seasons.
The Southern Miss quarterback also scored on a 17-yard reception from receiver Quentin Pierce.
Wright’s long kickoff return made it 28-all early in the fourth quarter. Chris Philpott’s 36-yard field goal gave the Cardinals their first lead with 6:30 remaining.
Davis completed 19 of 32 passes, including TD throws of 32 yards to Pierce and 8 yards to Zeke Walters for the Golden Eagles (8-5).
In addition to becoming the Southern Miss career TD pass leader, the junior moved into second place on the school’s career passing list with 7,396 yards — 299 short of the 7,695 Favre threw for from 1987-90. Meanwhile, Desmond Johnson scored on a 62-yard run and finished with a season-high 107 yards rushing.
The win enabled Louisville to finish Charlie Strong’s first season as a head coach with the Cardinals’ first winning record since 2006.
Bilal Powell rushed for 75 yards for Louisville — well below his season average of 120.9 — however the 215-pound senior was instrumental in helping the Cardinals exhaust most of the clock after finally taking the lead.
Although they were meeting for the first time in a bowl game, there’s a long history between the former conference rivals.
The Cardinals and Golden Eagles faced each other every season from 1978 to 1991 and both were members of C-USA 1996 to 2004, the season before Louisville moved to the Big East.
Southern Miss scored on its first two possessions, taking a quick 14-0 lead on Pierce’s TD reception and Johnson’s long run that left Louisville’s defense, which ranked 11th nationally during the regular season, looking sluggish and bewildered.

description.hltext_display: Roundup: WHS girls beat Athens
description.content:
Rachel Fatherly and Aisha Evans combined for 30 points to lead Williamsport to a 47-45 win over Athens Tuesday night in girls basketball.
In boys basketball, Emmitt Watson scored 22 points as Canton beat Elkland, 54-45.
Doug Zehner scored 26 points as Muncy pulled away from St. John Neumann in the fourth quarter, 72-62.
Mount Carmel turned a 4-point halftime lead into a 54-36 win over Warrior Run.
Dalton Molyneux scored 10 points with 10 rebounds as Sullivan County beat Benton, 53-23.
Shikellamy outscored Jersey Shore by 14 points in the fourth quarter to win, 53-36.
Bloomsburg had four double-digit scorers in a 73-42 win over South Williamsport
Mitch Hock scored 14 points for Central Columbia in a 46-25 win over Montoursville.
Muncy scored five pins to go along with four wins by forfeit in a 54-27 win over South Williamsport.
Canton had seven pins and two major decisions in a 58-21 win over Williamson.
Montoursville had four pins in a 54-24 win over Mount Carmel.
Towanda won all but one bout in a 68-6 win over North Penn.
Midd-West beat Williamsport on criteria of most bouts won, 7-6, in a 36-36 match.
Troy had five pins and won by decision five times in a 45-18 win over Sullivan County.
Garrett Hauck was nearly pinned in the second period at 135 but battled off his back and pinned Tim Laubscher in 5:37 as Milton beat Selinsgrove, 47-25.
In boys swimming, Matt Runtas and Trevor Harris each won two individual events en route to a 102-69 win over Bloomsburg. Bloomsburg's Zach Stevens set a pool record with a time of 1:55.06 in the Individual Medley.
Bethann Schwoyer scored wins in the 200-yard freestyle and the 100-yard back to lead Williamsport's girls swim team to a 95-85 win over Bloomsburg.
In women's basketball, Penn State fell 82-73 to Drexel in a meeting of the two top 3-point shooting teams in the country. Drexel shot 50 percent on 3s, while PSU?was 6-for-19.
Bucknell fell 80-75 at Wofford to enter the holiday break at 2-7 despite Shelby Romine notching career highs with 23 points, 6 assists, and 6 rebounds.

description.hltext_display: Anchorage elementary getting wind turbine
description.content:
ANCHORAGE, Alaska — Begich Middle School in Anchorage has won school board approval to install a wind turbine.
The Anchorage Daily News reports it's part of a federal program to teach renewable energy. The turbine will generate enough electricity to run up to eight computers.
Alaska is one of 11 states in the Energy Department's Wind for Schools program.
Sherrod Elementary in Palmer also has a turbine. Schools in Juneau are working with the Coast Guard station's wind turbine.
Copyright 2010 Fairbanks Daily News-Miner. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: Fitch prüft Absenkung von Griechenland-Rating auf Ramschstatus
description.content:
Athen/New York (Reuters) - Die Ratingagentur Fitch droht Griechenland mit einer Herabstufung der Kreditwürdigkeit auf Ramschstatus.
Die Bonitätswächter nannten am Dienstag Sorgen um die finanzielle Zukunftsfähigkeit des hoch verschuldeten Euro-Landes als Grund für die Warnung. Die Einschätzung hänge von einem für Januar geplanten Bericht ab, der sich vor allem mit den wirtschaftlichen Chancen befassen soll. Zudem werde sich Fitch genau ansehen, ob die Regierung das unter Druck der Geldgeber verhängte Sparprogramm auch durchsetzen kann. Griechenland hatte im Mai als erstes Euro-Land milliardenschwere Hilfen der EU und des Internationalen Währungsfonds erhalten.
Derzeit bewertet Fitch die griechische Bonität mit BBB-Minus - Moody's sowie Standard & Poor's haben bereits einen Ramschstatus diagnostiziert. Die anderen Euro-Wackelkandidaten Irland und Spanien sind bereits mehrfach schlechter bewertet worden. Portugal droht eine Herabstufung durch Moody's.
© Thomson Reuters 2010 Alle Rechte vorbehalten.
